name: 石林
mystery: 卡乌斯部落的石语者们已经看守石林的石巢神庙几百年了。虽然石头依旧沉默，但其底下的混乱随时可能爆发。在此之前，需要有石语者留心征兆并让部落准备好进行抵御。
des:
Rockgrove, known to the locals as Krona-Konu, is an Argonian settlement and trial located in the southeastern reaches of Blackwood.
Rockgrove was recently attacked and taken over by the hostile Sul-Xan tribe, who are now working on a ritual to bring in powerful Daedra from The Deadlands to cross over into Tamriel.

BOSS.name: 蛇浴
BOSS.des:
Basks-In-Snakes is a large Naga snake handler and member of the Sul-Xan tribe who can be found in the Overgrown Thoroughfare of Rockgrove. He is accompanied by his Giant Snake.
He is an optional boss of the trial, located behind some building off the main path; from the trial entrance, you can find him by taking a left through the hostile flora rather than a right up the stairs to the next section of trash mobs.

skills.name: 迅捷射击
skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 箭矢倾泻
skills.des: Basks-In-Snakes shoots a spray of arrows in the direction he is facing as indicated by a red cone. This attack does high physical damage as well as snares all enemies hit.

skills.name: 齐攻
skills.des: Basks-In-Snakes fires continuously at an area as indicated by a red circle. This attack does high physical damage over time. Unlike standard archers, several volleys in a row are fired.

skills.name: 瞄准目标
skills.des: A powerful sniping bow attack that takes time to charge up which deals massive physical damage. This can be interrupted.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: Basks-In-Snakes summons a group of five smaller giant snakes to come assist.

BOSS.name: 奥西索
BOSS.des:
Oaxiltso is an Argonian behemoth and a member of the Sul-Xan tribe who can be found in the Ruined Springs of Rockgrove. He is the first boss of the trial.
Unlike most behemoths, his scales are red; Dust-On-Scales believes this to be some form of corruption, possibly resulting from Oaxiltso being altered somehow by Flame-Herald Bahsei's Daedric magic.

skills.name: 沼泽粉碎
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 贪欲啃咽
skills.des: Oaxiltso performs a deep bite at his target, dealing massive physical damage. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 狂野闪击
skills.des: Oaxiltso charges forward and chomps the farthest (within 25m range) target, dealing massive physical damage. This can (and should) be dodged by the target and everyone on Oaxiltso's path, should he charge through the group.

skills.name: Fiery Stomp
skills.des: Oaxiltso performs a series of three stomping attacks, first stomping each of his feet, and ending with a jumping stomp. All three release flaming trails outward which deal high flame damage each. There isn't any AoE indicator during this ability.

skills.name: 爆裂碎击
skills.des: Oaxiltso slams his fists into the ground, exploding the earth struck, as indicated by a large red circle. The initial hit deals very high physical damage, and the lingering area deals continuous high flame damage. This can be performed both up close or standing further away, spawning the cracked earth near his target.

skills.name: 剧毒淤泥
skills.des: Oaxiltso retches poison on two targets in the party, prioritizing those farthest from the pools in the corners of the arena, if he can, otherwise he will select random targets. Poisoned targets will take ramping poison damage and drop Noxious Pools (small poison AOE) at their feet until they cleanse the effect by walking into the pools (which will turn the pool poisonous for a duration, dealing damage to anyone standing in it and not cleansing poisoned players).

skills.name: Summon Havocrel Annihilators
skills.des: At 90%/75%/50%/25% health, Oaxiltso howls to Mehrunes Dagon for aid, causing three meteors and then a Havocrel Annihilator to fall from the sky into the arena, in blasts indicated by charging AoE circles, dealing high flame damage. On Veteran difficulty, Havocrel Annihilators have a noteworthy ability to cast enraging aura on themselves shortly after entering the fight - if Oaxiltso comes in its range, both him and the Havocrel enrage, boosting damage from all sources originating from their abilities, including poison DoTs and Noxious Pools. Havocrels should be burned down as quickly as possible when they appear (the last one can be held away from the boss, instead).

skills.name: Summon Death Hoppers
skills.des: Occasionally, Death Hoppers are summoned during the fight to assist.

BOSS.name: 烈焰先驱巴塞
BOSS.des:
Flame-Herald Bahsei is a Naga warrior-mage and member of the Sul-Xan tribe who can be found atop the Xanmeer Pinnacle in Rockgrove. She is the second boss of the trial. She is the leader of the forces that attacked Rockgrove.
Bahsei is a worshipper of Mehrunes Dagon and has opened an Oblivion Gate in an effort to summon Xalvakka to Tamriel. She has used her magic to harvest the souls of all who have died in the attack on the settlement, to be sacrificed to Xalvakka. When you confront her, she will transform into a Bone Goliath before the fight starts.

skills.name: Twin Strikes
skills.des: A double-hitting basic melee attack, dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: Savage Blows
skills.des: A double-hitting basic melee attack, dealing slightly more damage than "Twin Strikes".

skills.name: 死亡之吻
skills.des: Flame-Herald Bahsei swings with her magical scythe at targets, dealing high physical damage and staggering.

skills.name: 血肉撕裂
skills.des: Flame-Herald Bahsei strikes a pose with her dual blades, before delivering a powerful overhead blow with her left blade, dealing massive physical damage. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 骷髅齐射
skills.des: Flame-Herald Bahsei raises her sword up and shoots a volley of blue skulls, each at random target in the arena, dealing high magical damage repeatedly. This can be interrupted.

skills.name: 诅咒之地
skills.des: Flame-Herald Bahsei targets two farthest players and summons lich crystals at their feet, cursing them and anyone caught in the area around those crystals. Curse deals continuous high magical damage and, after 10 seconds, expires and sends two magical swirls away from the affected player on a counter-clockwise curved trajectory. These swirls, if touched, will apply the same curse, and also explode, dealing massive damage to other players nearby (deadly on Veteran difficulty).

skills.name: Cursed Wind
skills.des: Flame-Herald Bahsei swings her weapon, aiming at the player that holds the aggro, and sends three tornado of corrupted magic their way. The targeted player immediately gets the same curse as "Cursed Ground", and the swirls function similarly to the ones from expired curse, except for straight line trajectories.

skills.name: 流星群
skills.des: When Flame-Herald Bahsei reaches 25% health, she triggers this execute-phase ability where she calls on a rain of meteors onto the arena, indicated by several large red circles, each dealing very high flame damage. Occasionally, one of them, after landing, turns into Prime Meteor, and if it isn't destroyed fast enough, it explodes, one-shotting nearby targets.

skills.name: Summoning Runes
skills.des: Before the battle, Flame-Herald Bahsei will place six runes around the arena. During the fight, Forgotten Archers are occasionally summoned from the runes. Also, at health thresholds of 90% / 85% / 80% / 75% / 70% / 65% / 60%, Bahsei will summon a Flesh Abomination at one of the runes. Following the 55% health threshold, these summons cease, in favor of the following summons.

skills.name: 召唤巨兽
skills.des: At health thresholds of 50% / 40% / 30% / 20% / 10%, a Fire Behemoth will rush out of the Oblivion portal.

skills.name: Summon Specters
skills.des: From 55% health threshold and onward, occasionally, Burning Specters will be summoned from the lava surrounding the arena.

skills.name: 大衮之怒
skills.des: From 55% health threshold and onward, moving walls of flames will occasionally run through the arena, starting from the lava surrounding the arena, each dealing high flame damage and knocking back. These don't have AoE indicators.

BOSS.name: 灰烬泰坦
BOSS.des: The Ash Titan is a powerful Daedric Titan that serves as the third boss of Rockgrove, which is encountered inside the Oblivion Gate. It is a servant of Xalvakka and guards the entrance to the Tower of the Five Crimes alongside several Havocrels.

BOSS.name: 夏尔瓦卡
BOSS.des:
Xalvakka is a large Dagonic harvester found in the Tower of the Five Crimes inside the Oblivion Gate in Rockgrove. She serves as the final boss of the trial. The Sul-Xan attacked Rockgrove and sacrificed the souls of its inhabitants to Xalvakka in an effort to summon her into Tamriel.
In Veteran mode, you can activate Hard Mode for this fight by activating the Challenge Banner at the end of the bridge leading to her tower, on the left as you approach.

skills.name: 无情开膛手
skills.des: Xalvakka performs five claw swipes back to back, dealing a massive combined amount of flame damage. This can be blocked.

skills.name: 死星
skills.des: Xalvakka conjures three meteors, one after the other, that fall at a target's location, indicated by a large red circle, dealing very high flame damage.

skills.name: 蠕变歧管
skills.des: Xalvakka conjures a spell that envelops several targets with a ring of fire, indicated by a small red ring around them, dealing continuous and unavoidable high flame damage.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: Xalvakka shrieks, summoning allies to her side. These include Clannfear, Corrupted Azureplasms, Daedroth, Flame Atronachs, Flame Watchers, Iron Atronachs, and   Scamps.

skills.name: Summon Wraiths
skills.des: Xalvakka summons Wraiths, which slowly move towards her. If allowed to reach her, she absorbs the wraiths, gaining a damage shield portion for each one. If too many empower her, her shield becomes unbreakable and she wipes the party.

skills.name: 腐蚀爆轰
skills.des: If Xalvakka has a damage shield up and wraiths are absorbed, this spell is flung at targets, dealing high magical damage. The more wraiths are allowed to be absorbed, the stronger this attack becomes.

skills.name: 灵魂共振
skills.des: Slain wraith die in a blast that apply the "Soul Resonance" debuff on nearby targets, dealing high magical damage over time and slowing them down. Affected targets appear with blue mist around them. The "Soul Purge" synergy can be used to get rid of this effect, which results in Corrupted Azureplasm to be put on the ground at the location where the synergy was used. However, anyone standing in this glob will be dramatically slowed, so be careful of where the synergy is performed. After a short while, the glob explodes, dealing very high physical damage.

skills.name: 后撤
skills.des: At 70% and 40% health, Xalvakka slithers away and flees the current floor of the tower she is on. She must be chased up a stairwell, which is lined with flame spout traps, each dealing high flame damage, and while in the stairwell, there is also a damage over time effect applied on top. Lava rises from below, and stepping into it causes a one-shot.

skills.name: 拆分
skills.des: This ability starts being used once on the second floor. Xalvakka splits herself into three copies, all spread out across the arena, which also becomes engulfed in flames completely at that time, which deals continuous high flame damage. These copies appear as Volatile Shells, and to make Xalvakka reappear, the real her must be found and attacked. The way to discern the real Xalvakka is that the clones will appear see-through (when standing very close to them in melee range only).

skills.name: Summon Goliath
skills.des: If Xalvakka isn't damaged to make her retreat fast enough, a red portal opens in the arena, which releases a powerful Havocrel Goliath. The goliath's most noteworthy attack is that he will raise his weapon up and fill most of the arena, except for a small safe zone in the center, with lava, which will quickly kill any target that ventures into it.

achievement.name: 苏尔山样式大师
achievement.des: 学习苏尔山样式书的每一章，该样式书可通过击败石林的最终BOSS获得。

achievement.name: 夏尔瓦卡的克星
achievement.des: 完成列出的石林成就。

achievement.name: 石林胜利者
achievement.des: 在石林中，击败奥西索、烈焰先驱巴塞和夏尔瓦卡。

name: 庇护圣所
location: Far west within the Reactor District
des:
The Asylum Sanctorium is a mini trial found within the Reactor District in the Brass Fortress.
You will receive a Radiance Resonator with your other rewards after defeating Saint Olms with hard mode engaged.

BOSS.name: 公正圣徒奥尔姆斯
BOSS.des: Saint Olms the Just is the final boss, or the only boss if you so choose, of the Asylum Sanctorium trial. In life he was a saint of the Tribunal Temple and has now had his soul transported into the body of a Clockwork Titan, where he has been gradually losing his sanity.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that does high physical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this on the tank only.

skills.name: 蒸汽阵风
skills.des: At 90%, 75%, 50% and 25% health he will jump from between the left and right side of the arena, dealing very high damage when he lands. At the same time, all players will get small red circles around them that deal moderate physical damage every time he lands. Stay near the entrance or opposite the entrance to avoid the main damage from the jumps and avoid stacking to minimize damage from the smaller AOEs. Blocking and shielding will also help mitigate the smaller AOE damage.

skills.name: 耗能冲击
skills.des: Saint Olms will place a lightning AOE on the furthest away player in front of him. Standing in the red circle will drain your resources and deal damage to you. It is common for most groups to have a non-tank person (usually a healer) be the "kiter" to deal with this mechanic; that person will stand some distance in front of the boss near the edge of the arena, where they are out of range of Scalding Roar. This will bait the boss to place the AOE on the kiter instead of the main tank, allowing the main tank to keep the boss still.

skills.name: 灼热咆哮
skills.des: A breath attack that hit all targets in front of the boss for very high flame damage as indicated by a red cone. This attack must be avoided at all costs by the tank as being hit by this will cause your armor to shatter (basically reducing armor to 0) and you will receive a healing debuff.

skills.name: Storm the Heavens
skills.des: Lightning will fall on each player's position as indicated by red circles. Each time you are hit by one of these you will take more damage from the next. Saint Olms will jump in air just before this attack, and all players have to move continuously to avoid being hit. Avoid stacking with other players when this mechanic happens as AOEs will stack making them harder to avoid.

skills.name: 烈焰试炼
skills.des: When low on health (around 20%), Saint Olms will create 3 large fire AOEs. Being inside one of these will put a damage over time effect on you which must be purged on veteran mode. Two AOEs will always be on the left and right side of the arena, and the last will either be near the entrance or opposite the entrance.

skills.name: Shocking Slam
skills.des: If standing behind him, Saint Olms will slam his axe tail into the ground violently, causing five traveling shock fields to move outward from the impact point, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing high shock damage each. The tail itself doesn't inflict damage.

skills.name: 免伤
skills.des: Saint Olms is invulnerable for as long as there is an Ordinated Protector present, they must be killed immediately to progress the fight.

skills.name: 召唤蜘蛛
skills.des: Throughout the fight, Firepot Spiders will spawn and explode near players leaving behind flaming red circles, dealing continuous high flame damage.

BOSS.name: 鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯
BOSS.des:
Saint Felms the Bold is a contemporary and companion of the Tribunal whose soul was placed into a giant factotum body along with Saint Llothis the Pious and Saint Olms the Just.
Unfortunately, the process wasn't a success and the three are under the care of Alienist Llandras in the Asylum Sanctorium.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: Basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 传送打击
skills.des: Saint Felms teleports over to you and strikes with his axes, dealing high physical damage. The next attack after teleporting somewhere else will always be Shrapnel Storm.

skills.name: 弹片风暴
skills.des: Saint Felms summons a storm of pointed metal that whirls around and lingers for a long duration, indicated by a moderately-sized AoE, dealing continuous high physical damage and causes Bleeding.

skills.name: 显化怒火
skills.des: Saint Felms raises his hand to the sky, causing two volatile projectiles to come slamming down into the arena and sending out shockwaves of dark energy. The initial blasts are indicated by large growing circular AoEs and deal very high physical damage, and the shockwaves don't have indicators and deal high magical damage.

skills.name: Summon Projections
skills.des: Throughout the fight, Saint Felms will summon a pair of Pneuma Projections to assist him in battle. They fight much like assassins but their attacks apply bleeding over time, and if left alive for too long, they enrage, drastically increasing their damage output.

BOSS.name: 虔诚圣徒洛提斯
BOSS.des:
Saint Llothis the Pious is a contemporary and companion of the Tribunal whose soul was placed into a giant factotum body along with Saint Felms the Bold and Saint Olms the Just.
Unfortunately, the process wasn't a success and the three are under the care of Alienist Llandras in the Asylum Sanctorium.
During combat, Saint Llothis primarily uses poison-based attacks from his staff, and is accompanied by Imperfect Attendants, who will respawn if destroyed after a duration.

skills.name: Poisonous Bolt
skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate poison damage.

skills.name: 蒸汽喷射
skills.des: Saint Llothis targets a member of the party, indicated by a thin tracking conal AoE, releasing high-pressured steam from his hand, dealing continuous very high physical damage. This attack must be blocked in its entirety.

skills.name: 亵渎爆轰
skills.des: Saint Llothis raises his staff to the sky, releasing a continuous spree of poisonous bolts that split into multiple smaller ones that hit every member of the party for very high poison damage and causes a stagger. This ability should be interrupted.

skills.name: 传送
skills.des: Throughout the fight, Saint Llothis will teleport throughout the arena to create space. The location from which he teleports from and the spot he teleports to are then marked by noxious fields that linger, indicated by a large circular AoEs, dealing continuous high poison damage.

achievement.name: 庇护圣所救赎者
achievement.des: 完成列出的庇护圣所成就。

achievement.name: 庇护圣所征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯、虔诚圣徒洛提斯和鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯。

achievement.name: 庇护圣所胜利者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，在同一场战斗中击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯、虔诚圣徒洛提斯和鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯。

achievement.name: 正义的谴责
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，在同一场战斗中击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯和虔诚圣徒洛提斯。

achievement.name: 完美净化
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，于进入圣所中庭后15分钟内的同一场战斗中击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯、虔诚圣徒洛提斯和鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯。

achievement.name: 庇护圣所已完成
achievement.des: 在庇护圣所中击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯、虔诚圣徒洛提斯和鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯。

achievement.name: 庇护圣所争夺者
achievement.des: 在庇护圣所中，在同一场战斗中击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯、虔诚圣徒洛提斯和鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯。

achievement.name: 圣化
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯、虔诚圣徒洛提斯和鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯。

achievement.name: 快速的恩慈
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，在15分钟的时间限制内击败公正圣徒奥尔姆斯、虔诚圣徒洛提斯和鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯。当玩家进入圣所中庭时开始计时。

achievement.name: 快乐的灭亡
achievement.des: Defeat Saint Olms the Just, Saint Llothis the Pious, and Saint Felms the Bold at the same time without allowing Saint Felms or Saint Llothis to enrage during the fight.

achievement.name: 不完美的存在
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，在不拆除虔诚圣徒洛提斯的瑕疵侍从的情况下击败他。

achievement.name: 平静的投射
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）庇护圣所中，在不让鲁莽圣徒菲尔姆斯的任何气动投射暴怒的情况下击败他。

name: 艾瑟瑞恩档案塔
mystery: 不知多少年以来，这座塔一直赫然耸立在爱林希尔的土地上，入口神秘地封锁着，禁止进入。有人竭尽全力在这个地方设置了密不透的病房——但现在这些病房被分割开来了。
des:
The Aetherian Archive is a tower in southeastern Craglorn near the city of Elinhir.
Within the tower, groups of twelve battle through a series of challenges and ultimately face the Mage.
The Aetherian Archive Trial quest begins when you enter the dungeon. You have to complete the dungeon within a certain amount of time with limited respawns. The Mage's Tower is a quest to defeat the Celestial Mage, who is the final enemy in this dungeon. The bosses are the Lightning Storm Atronach, the Foundation Stone Atronach, Varlariel, and the Mage herself.
The Firstmages, the residents of the tower, can be encountered on both friendly and hostile terms as you progress through the trial. The very beginning of the trial contains three Elemental Traps and Bottomless Pits are present throughout the whole trial.
You will receive a Periapt of Elinhir from Mindil the Untested with your other rewards after defeating The Mage with hard mode engaged.

BOSS.name: 闪电风暴侍灵
BOSS.des: The Lightning Storm Atronach is a storm atronach that serves as the first boss in the Aetherian Archive.

skills.name: 巴什
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate-high physical damage.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate-high physical damage.

skills.name: 迫近风暴
skills.des: The Lightning Storm Atronach overcharges before releasing five shock storms going out in all directions from itself, indicated by red cicles, dealing moderate-high shock damage each.

skills.name: 风暴围困
skills.des: The Lightning Storm Atronach slams the ground, conjuring and sending a homing electric orb at its target. On contact, it deals moderate shock damage and morphs into a shocking field around them, indicated by a red circle, and tracks their movement. The field deals continuous minor shock damage and applies a constant snare on the target. Blocking or dodge rolling won't escape the field, so the damage must be endured or the initial orb must be avoided with dodge roll (blocking the orb doesn't prevent the effects from being applied).

skills.name: 闪电风暴
skills.des: The Lightning Storm Atronach will barrage the group with lightning strikes as the arena darkens. You must run over to an "Eye of the Storm" golden circle of safety that appears just before this attack begins to avoid taking damage. It has five spawn locations: one is on the left side of the arena, one is on the right, one is by the entrance cliff, one is by the bridge behind the boss, and one is by the teleportation pads to the right of the bridge. If you go too long without standing in the safety circle, you will die as the shock damage dramaticaly increases after each lightning strike.

BOSS.name: 石头侍灵基座
BOSS.des: The Foundation Stone Atronach is a stone atronach acting as the second boss in the Aetherian Archive. Unlike regular stone atronachs, it is much larger and decorated with ancient Nedic carvings.

skills.name: 石之凝视
skills.des: Basic ranged attack dealing high magic damage.

skills.name: 大地震
skills.des: The Atronach slams its "head" into the ground several times, each time dealing moderate-high physical damage in a very large area. This ability must be healed through.

skills.name: 巨石风暴
skills.des: The atronach goes into "turtle" mode and hides its head. Stones will be thrown at individual players, each dealing moderate-high physical damage in a small area. The group must spread out and block to prevent shrapnel from hitting each other. If you don't block, you'll be knocked down.

skills.name: 仆从
skills.des: The Foundation Stone Atronach summons Firstmage Chainspinners and Nullifiers.

BOSS.name: 瓦尔拉瑞尔
BOSS.des: Varlariel is a wispmother acting as the third boss of the Aetherian Archive.

skills.name: 寒霜吐息
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing very high frost damage in an cone.

skills.name: 幽魂之雨
skills.des: The wispmother summons a volley of wisps that crash into the ground all around the arena, indicated by numerous red circles, dealing very-high frost damage each.

skills.name: 夜母复制
skills.des: Varlariel can split into four clones of herself to divert attention from the party. The clones' health do not scale with Varlariel's current Health. "Combustion/Infused Combustion" always occurs after this.

skills.name: Combustion/Infused Combustion
skills.des: Some time after "Mother Clone", an non-avoidable arena-wide explosion occurs which scales with how many clones are still alive:

BOSS.name: 法师座
BOSS.des:
The Mage is the embodiment of the Mage Constellation. She appears as a large sorceress wearing a celestial-styled mask. The Firstmages refer to her as the Learned One.
By corrupting her Apex Stone, the Serpent drove the Mage into a physical form, where it split her into five aspects to corrupt them one by one. While the Serpent managed to corrupt one aspect now only known as the Lost One, Mahlia and Faryan have gone into hiding in the dungeons of Rkundzelft and Hircine's Haunt, respectively. The remaining two aspects, Ahlora and Valla, went to Belkarth to get the support of the Star-Gazers in stopping the Serpent's plans. During The Shattered and the Lost, you are tasked with investigating whether they are really aspects of the Mage, and how to help them in their endeavor. After you locate all the aspects, they reunite with the Lost One to once again become the Mage.
Still suffering from the Serpent's corruption of the Lost One, the Mage has withdrawn to the upper levels of the Aetherian Archive to contain the damage she causes.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.des: Basic ranged attack dealing extremely high shock damage that arcs up to 8 other players. It is advised that ranged dps stand on the outside of the stone circle while melee dps stand on the Mage as to reduce the chance of chain lightning spreading.

skills.name: 召唤地雷
skills.des: The Mage summons Daedric Mines-like areas dealing high magic damage in an area when stepped on.

skills.name: 黑洞
skills.des: The Mage summons an expanding area containing the starry void dealing continuous direct high frost damage to targets inside. Multiple Black Holes can be up at a time.

skills.name: 寰宇冲击
skills.des: Mono-target attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: Summon Conjured Reflection
skills.des: The Mage will summon a Conjured Reflection, which looks like a miniature-sized version of herself. These reflections will periodically damage the four closest players so burn them down as soon as they are summoned.

skills.name: 召唤斧头
skills.des: The Mage will summon a Conjured Axe which will begin to deal damage to one person in the group. It is advised that the tank taunts these axes when they're spawned and brings far away from the group. The area the group ended up after taking the teleportation pads to the tower's summit (the rock platform opposite of where the Mage was meditating before you killed the Firstmages she had turned on you) is a good spot. The tank must hold these axes in place and keep them taunted so they do not kill the other group members. On veteran difficulty, they all but one-shot most party members.

skills.name: Arcane Vortex/StarEndPhase
skills.des: When reaching (?)% The Mage will slam her staff down on the ground five times. When she does this, the group must roll dodge into the middle as close to The Mage as possible. Each slam knocks down all targets. After the fifth hit from her staff, she will begin channeling a devastating spell dealing continuous direct moderate-high flame damage to all targets and that will destroy your group if she is not killed fast enough. Focus all damage on The Mage and burn her down to avoid the one-hit kill explosion.

skills.name: 随时有可能爆炸
skills.des: The Mage's Storm Atronachs (which are spawned every ten to twenty seconds or so on hard mode) will enter execute phase when they reach 20% health, and begin spraying lightning everywhere. This attack is similar to Stormfist's enrage mechanic. For easy burning, the main tank should pull every atronach to the middle on the mage as soon as they are noticed. These storm atronachs must be focused by the stamina dps to be brought down as soon as possible when they reach 20%. They have a total of 2,875,839 health each.

skills.name: 流星
skills.des: Meteors will constantly fall on the arena during hard mode, causing circular AoEs to appear on the ground and dealing high flame damage. Do not take your chances with rolling, as you either may not make it, or risk roll-dodging off the cliff and into the void.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.des: Basic ranged attack dealing high shock damage that arcs up to the other player. It is advised that both players move away from each other as to reduce the chance of chain lightning spreading.

skills.name: 召唤地雷
skills.des: The Mage summons Daedric Mines-like areas dealing moderate-high magic damage in an area when stepped on.

skills.name: 黑洞
skills.des: The Mage summons an expanding area containing the starry void dealing continuous direct frost damage to targets inside. Multiple Black Holes can be up at a time.

skills.name: Summon Conjured Reflection
skills.des: The Mage will summon a Conjured Reflection, which looks like a miniature-sized version of herself. These reflections will periodically damage both players so burn them down as soon as they are summoned.

skills.name: 召唤斧头
skills.des: The Mage will summon a Conjured Axe which will begin to deal damage to one person in the group. It is advised that the tankiest player taunts these axes when they're spawned and brings far away from the other player. The tankiest player must hold these axes in place and keep them taunted so they do not kill the other player.

skills.name: Arcane Vortex/StarEndPhase
skills.des: When reaching (?)% The Mage will slam her staff down on the ground five times. When she does this, the group must roll dodge into the middle as close to The Mage as possible. Each slam knocks down all targets. After the fifth hit from her staff, she will begin channeling a devastating spell dealing continuous direct moderate-high flame damage to all targets and that will destroy your group if she is not killed fast enough. Focus all damage on The Mage and burn her down to avoid the one-hit kill explosion.

achievement.name: 艾瑟瑞恩档案塔已完成
achievement.des: 击败法师星，将她从蝮蛇座的控制中解救出来。

achievement.name: 限时试炼：艾瑟瑞恩档案塔
achievement.des: 在限时33分钟内完成艾瑟瑞恩档案塔（老兵模式）。

achievement.name: 艾瑟瑞恩档案塔征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）艾瑟瑞恩档案塔中击败法师星。

achievement.name: 艾瑟瑞恩档案塔（困难模式）
achievement.des: 在通过粉碎缥缈法球嘲讽法师星之后将其击败。

name: 赫尔拉要塞
mystery: 拉嘉达的战士登陆落锤省海岸时，一些最为勇猛的队伍朝着内陆进发，寻找领地。赫尔拉是位于最东部的领地之一，然而它的大门很久以前就封死了。
des:
Hel Ra Citadel is an ancient Yokudan fortress in southwestern Craglorn.
It has been taken over by The Warrior and his Anka-Ra armies, having been corrupted by The Serpent.
Hel Ra Citadel Hard Mode can be triggered by entering the Veteran version of the trial and destroying the statues in the room before the Warrior's chamber.
Completing a full run of Veteran Hel Ra Citadel will reward 12 Undaunted Plunder worth 12000 gold total (2 from Ra Kotu, 2 from Yokeda Kai or Yokeda Rok'dun, and 8 from The Warrior). You will receive a Star-Studded Champion's Baldric for defeating The Warrior with hard mode active.

BOSS.name: 拉·阔图
BOSS.des:
Ra Kotu is a massive air atronach encountered in Hel Ra Citadel, where it serves as the first boss.
It is found at the first gate, and is summoned after the waves of Anka Ra there are defeated, accompanied by one Anka-Ra Destroyer and two Anka-Ra War-Priests.

skills.name: 挥击
skills.des: A basic melee attack that deals moderate physical damage. Ra Kotu alternates sword hands after every strike.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: Ra Kotu winds all six of its swords back behind itself before slashing the three pairs together in front of itself, as indicated by a large red cone, dealing high physical damage and knocking you back.

skills.name: 重攻击
skills.des: Ra Kotu shields himself with all six of its swords before fanning them out with strength in front of itself, dealing massive physical damage. This attack must be blocked.

skills.name: 六剑奇袭
skills.des: Ra Kotu clutches four of its swords against its chest before throwing them outward from its position a moderate distance before they boomerang back into its hands, as indicated by large red circular AoEs under the traveling swords, dealing very high physical damage.

skills.name: 剑刃漩涡
skills.des: Upon reaching 30% health, Ra Kotu begins to spin its body and all of its blades around in place nonstop for a long duration, as indicated by a large red circular AoE beneath itself, dealing very high continuous physical damage and snaring targets hit.

BOSS.name: 尤可达·凯
BOSS.des: Yokeda Kai is an Anka-Ra mage defending Hel Ra Citadel against intruders. He is one of two possible second bosses that the team will face in the trial, the other being Yokeda Rok'dun, as the team splits into two teams of six after the first boss. He must be defeated to progress further.

skills.name: 火光
skills.des: A basic ranged attack that does moderate flame damage.

skills.name: 流星
skills.des: The boss drops a meteor on top of a target player as indicated by a red circle, dealing high flame damage and stunning the target. Blocking can help the player survive this attack.

skills.name: 焦枯之土
skills.des: The meteor leaves behind a pool of fire that does moderate flame damage over time as indicated by a small red circle.

skills.name: 脉冲星
skills.des: The boss releases flame around itself as indicated by a red circle. This attack does high flame damage and must be blocked or shielded through at all costs.

skills.name: 炼狱
skills.des: The boss channels flame above itself that deals moderate flame damage to all players over time, increasing over time. This attack will stagger nearby players briefly and must be interrupted quickly.

skills.name: 召唤克隆
skills.des: The boss moves to the center of the room and summons three copies of himself at four fixed locations in the room. These clones will be invulnerable while the original boss can still be damaged. These clones must be killed quickly to simplify the fight. When the clones cast Inferno, interrupting them will kill them immediately. If the interrupt is missed, they will disappear after some time by themselves.

skills.name: 尤可达之怒
skills.des: If the group fighting Yokeda Rok'dun down below is defeated, flares of bright light not unlike those produced during The Warrior's Shehai Storm will rain down from the sky, causing the group fighting Yokeda Kai to wipe.

BOSS.name: 尤可达·洛克顿
BOSS.des:
Yokeda Rok'dun is a Redguard Anka-Ra warrior encountered on the left path of the Hel Ra Citadel.
He is accompanied by Enraging Welwas, which he will reanimate if they die. He is one of two possible second bosses that the team will face in the trial, the other being Yokeda Kai.

skills.name: Arrow Shot
skills.des: A basic ranged attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 火焰爆弹
skills.des: Yokeda Rok'dun throws a fire bomb at you, exploding for very high flame damage and high damage over time. Multiple fire trails also shoot out in all directions from the explosion.

skills.name: Revival
skills.des: Yokeda Rok'dun dashes over to a dead welwa and revives it. After reanimating one, more welwas start appearing in the arena.

skills.name: 尤可达之怒
skills.des: If the group fighting Yokeda Kai up top is defeated, flares of bright light not unlike those produced during The Warrior's Shehai Storm will rain down from the sky, causing the group fighting Yokeda Rok'dun to wipe.

BOSS.name: 战士
BOSS.des:
The Warrior is one of the three guardian signs who protect Tamriel from the Celestial Serpent. However, before the events of Craglorn, the Serpent corrupted the Mage and the Warrior, turning them against Tamriel and into agents of chaos.
The Warrior resembles a large soldier with a Yokudan mask. He is encountered throughout the Hel Ra Citadel, and is the final enemy of the trial. In it, he is fought in his stone-like Anka-Ra form within the Hall of the Warrior, the final chamber. Upon defeat, he will turn into a pile of dust and speak to The Thief, saying he is free from the Serpent's control.
He is also encountered in the Infinite Archive as a maligraphy.

skills.name: Mace Swing
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 盾牌投掷
skills.des: The Warrior throws his shield across the room, indicated by a long red rectangle AoE, dealing very high physical damage.

skills.name: 腾跃
skills.des: The Warrior quickly runs back before leaping back into battle, indicated by a large growing red AoE, dealing very high physical damage.

skills.name: 引导挥击
skills.des: The Warrior chases one enemy and attacks them with his mace multiple times, and can easily kill them with just a few blows.

skills.name: 灵剑风暴爆炸
skills.des: Getting rid of his mace and shield, the warrior quickly corporealizes a powerful Shehai Sword in his hands, building it upwards. Once the sword is fully summoned, it causes an explosive shockwave that blasts open the walls and knocks players back.

skills.name: Summon Anka-Ra
skills.des: During the fight, Anka-Ra Destroyers and Flame-Shapers will periodically animate and join the fight.

skills.name: 引导挥击
skills.des: The Warrior chases one enemy and attacks them with his sword multiple times, and can easily kill them with just a few blows.

skills.name: 魂刃横劈
skills.des: The Warrior swings his greatsword in a wide radius in front of him, indicated by a red cone AoE, dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: Shehai Beam
skills.des: The Warrior plants his greatsword into the ground and rapidly sends out a beam of magic from it through the ground at players, dealing very high magical damage. After performing two of these attacks, he transitions into Shehai Storm.

skills.name: 魂刃风暴
skills.des: The Warrior casts numerous electric bolts at each player, dealing a great deal of damage with each one. This attack can easily be countered by blocking with a weapon, which will greatly reduce the damage done.

skills.name: Summon Anka-Ra
skills.des: During the fight, Anka-Ra Destroyers and Flame-Shapers will periodically animate and join the fight.

achievement.name: 赫尔拉要塞已完成
achievement.des: 击败战士星，将他从蝮蛇星的控制中解救出来。

achievement.name: 限时试炼：赫尔拉要塞
achievement.des: 在限时33分钟内完成赫尔·拉要塞（老兵模式）。

achievement.name: 赫尔拉要塞征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）赫尔拉要塞中击败战士星。

achievement.name: 赫尔拉要塞（困难模式）
achievement.des: 在通过毁灭战士星的雕像军队激怒他之后将其击败。

achievement.name: 赫尔拉要塞：战争号角
achievement.enName: Hel Ra Citadel: The War Horn
achievement.des: Sound the war horn at Hel Ra Citadel and defeat the ancient warriors who answer.

name: 乌鞘蛇圣所
mystery: 圣所的洞穴是艺术品，是很久以前就密封起来的雕刻杰作。不幸的是，对于荒崖来说，乌鞘蛇人一直是最……狂热的天界教派。
des:
Sanctum Ophidia is an ancient Nedic temple in northern Craglorn.
It is the stronghold of the Celestial Serpent and his Scaled Court. It has both a Normal and a Veteran mode, as well as a "Hard Mode" which can be triggered only in Veteran mode by desecrating the sacred banners of the Scaled Court. Hard Mode only affects the Celestial Serpent, making this boss fight far more challenging.
You will receive The Serpent's Egg-Tooth for defeating the Celestial Serpent with hard mode active.

BOSS.name: 被灵魂附体的蝎尾兽
BOSS.des: The Possessed Mantikora is a mantikora found within Sanctum Ophidia. It glows green, having been possessed by the Serpent. It serves as the trial's first boss, and can be summoned by using the Nirncrux Altars at the red pool in the first chamber.

skills.name: Charged Punch
skills.des: Causes hemorrhaging.

skills.name: 震动
skills.des: Targets two players, and "popcorns" them. This ability causes an AoE to crawl out from under you. It strikes three times, and throws you into the air increasingly higher with each "pop". If you don't roll out of it, you're going to be killed by it on Veteran.

skills.name: 拳击
skills.des: Deals major physical damage. Has a chance to cause bleeding.

skills.name: 激怒拳击
skills.des: Only occurs on Veteran. One-shots everyone but the tank.

BOSS.name: 碎石者
BOSS.des: Stonebreaker is a giant armored troll infused with nirncrux, found within Sanctum Ophidia. It's initially held in place by a Serpent Fang and a Serpent War-Priest. He serves as the second boss of the trial.

skills.name: 拳击
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 投掷石块
skills.des: Stonebreaker quickly throws a rock in front of itself, indicated by a quickly casted AoE, dealing high physical damage and stunning you.

skills.name: Repeat Slam
skills.des: Stonebreaker slams the ground repeatedly, dealing high physical damage on each one to nearby opponents.

skills.name: 腾跃
skills.des: Stonebreaker jumps over to an opponent far away, dealing very high physical damage and knocking them down. This attack has no indicator.

skills.name: Raging Fist
skills.des: Stonebreaker begins pumping its chest rapidly while screaming, before slamming his fist into the ground, causing a huge earthquake all around itself, indicated by a very large growing AoE, causing massive physical damage. This attack must be blocked.

BOSS.name: 奥拉扎
BOSS.des: Ozara is a lamia who serves the Serpent. She is the third boss of Sanctum Ophidia.

BOSS.name: The Serpent
BOSS.des: The Serpent is a constellation that has fallen to Tamriel as a Celestial and now seeks to corrupt the other constellations and remake Nirn. He has taken over the minds of two of the Guardian Celestials, The Mage and The Warrior, with only The Thief escaping his grasp. He commands the Scaled Court, a group of fanatics operating in Craglorn that worship him.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: Basic melee attack dealing very high physical damage.

skills.name: 天界喷射
skills.des: The Serpent swings his sword in a forward arc, dealing very high magic damage in a cone AoE.

skills.name: 毒素打击
skills.des: The Serpent winds up his sword then strikes it from the top on a player, dealing extremely high poison damage. This attack must be blocked.

skills.name: 日蚀撕裂
skills.des: The Serpent charges up a ball of green energy in his left hand and continuously launch poisonous projectiles at multiple random players multiple times, each projectile dealing high poison damage. When this ends, World Shaper is always cast.

skills.name: 世界塑造者
skills.des: Once Eclipse Tear ends, he throws it either on the left or right side of the arena at random, forming a AoE that always deal lethal Oblivion Damage to players.

skills.name: 驱逐
skills.des: The Serpent leans back and a ghostly form drifts out of them into the air. They say that the stone has held them too long and they "will never go back", at which point the ghost is pulled back into the Serpent and purple orbs flies out of him into the ground. Walk into an orb to get protected against the incoming pulse that covers the platform, always dealing lethal Oblivion Damage to unprotected players.

skills.name: 毒雾
skills.des: The Serpent plants his sword in the ground and summons a large bubble of green energy that applies constant high poison damage. You must heal through the damage applied.

skills.name: Summon Cursed Totem
skills.des: Summons a Cursed Totem.

skills.name: Summon Empower Totem
skills.des: Summons a Empower Totem.

skills.name: Summon Wrest Totem
skills.des: Summons a Wrest Totem.

skills.name: Summon Allies
skills.des: The Serpent will summon Lamia Howlers and Mantikoras during the fight.

achievement.name: 乌鞘蛇圣所已完成
achievement.des: 击败蝮蛇星。

achievement.name: 限时试炼：乌鞘蛇圣所
achievement.des: 在限时33分钟内完成乌鞘蛇圣所（老兵模式）。

achievement.name: 乌鞘蛇圣所：饲料坑
achievement.des: 使用乌鞘蛇圣所的饲料堆并在随后的战斗中幸存下来。

achievement.name: 乌鞘蛇圣所征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）乌鞘蛇圣所中击败蝮蛇星。

achievement.name: 乌鞘蛇圣所（困难模式）
achievement.des: 在亵渎鳞之内阁的神圣旗帜之后击败蝮蛇星。

name: 恐帆礁石
mystery: 这个小岛位于西斯忒斯群岛的边缘，周围是浅浅的锯齿状珊瑚礁，并且有凶猛的捕食者盘踞于此。在恐帆舰队的女王宣称自己拥有它之前，这里几乎没有人类和精灵的存在。
des: Dreadsail Reef is a reef off the coast of High Isle that serves as a major base for the Dreadsails, a group of Maormer pirates.  You will receive a Fragment of the Fleet Queen's Anchor along with your other rewards after defeating the Fleet Queen with Hard Mode engaged.

BOSS.name: 图拉塞尔
BOSS.des: Turlassil (or Turli) is a blue striped Maormer found in Dreadsail Reef. He is the twin brother of Lylanar and both serve as the first boss of the trial.

BOSS.name: 折弓者
BOSS.des: Bow Breaker is a Coral Haj Mota found in the Reef Caverns section of Dreadsail Reef. It serves as one of the trial bosses.

BOSS.name: 破帆者
BOSS.des: Sail Ripper is a Harpy found in Dreadsail Reef. It acts as one of the bosses of the trial.

BOSS.name: 礁石守护者
BOSS.des: Reef Guardians are a type of golem made from coral and possessing a blue glow. They resemble Magma Golems. They can be found within Dreadsail Reef and along the coasts of Y'ffelon.

BOSS.name: 泰德伯恩·塔勒里亚
BOSS.des: Tideborn Taleria is a coral monstrosity that Fleet Queen Taleria turns herself into during the final battle of Dreadsail Reef. You will face her at the bottom of the Coral Caldera.

skills.des: Summons a Calamitous Sword.

achievement.name: 至高欺凌者
achievement.des: 在恐帆礁石完成列出的成就。

achievement.name: 恐帆礁石胜利者
achievement.des: 击败恐帆礁石的莱拉纳尔和图拉塞尔，礁石守护者和泰德伯恩·塔勒里亚。

achievement.name: 恐帆礁石征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中打败礁石守护者，莱拉纳尔和图拉塞尔，以及泰德伯恩·塔勒里亚。

achievement.name: 水兵之主
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中升起挑战旗帜后，一次性打败礁石守护者莱拉纳尔和图拉塞尔，以及泰德伯恩·塔勒里亚，且未获得任何棱镜共振的增益。

achievement.name: 鱼叉之锋
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）恐帆礁石后的30分钟内，打败礁石守护者，莱拉纳尔和图拉塞尔，以及泰德伯恩·塔勒里亚和作为他们随从的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 永不沉没
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中，打败礁石守护者，莱拉纳尔和图拉塞尔，以及泰德伯恩·塔勒里亚和作为他们随从的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 舰队女王的挫败
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在进入（老兵模式）恐帆礁石后的30分钟内，升起各自的挑战旗帜后，分别打败礁石守护者，莱拉纳尔和图拉塞尔，以及泰德伯恩·塔勒里亚和作为他们随从的所有敌人，且未获得任何棱镜共振的增益。

achievement.name: 恐帆杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中打败300名恐帆海盗。

achievement.name: 欧尔瑙格杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中打败50个欧尔瑙格。

achievement.name: 有意不从
achievement.des: 在恐帆礁石打败三十只被“毁灭余烬”驱除效果的寒霜猎犬和三十只被“穿刺寒雹”驱除效果的火焰猎犬。

achievement.name: 一入深渊
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中打败礁石守护者，且小队各成员落入礁石滩险的次数均不超过一次。

achievement.name: 巡游
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中升起挑战旗帜后，打败恐帆毒液召唤师、恐帆海炉工和恐帆潮汐法师，且相继击败的间隔不超过10秒。

achievement.name: 同步杀戮
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中打败折弓者和破帆者，且间隔不超过15秒。

achievement.name: 不宜居住
achievement.des: 在恐帆礁石协助阿尔达汉进行研究。

achievement.name: 巅峰角斗士表演
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中升起挑战旗帜后，打败莱拉纳尔和图拉塞尔。

achievement.name: 礁石破坏者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）恐帆礁石中升起挑战旗帜后，击败礁石守护者，且未获得任何棱镜共振的增益。

name: 太阳尖顶
mystery: 在萨尔睿道显灵之后罗尔卡神殿崛起之前，太阳尖顶才是安奎那境内最卓绝的朝圣之所。如果有关艾尔克许回归的传言是真的，它也许能再现辉煌。
des:
Sunspire is an ancient temple of Alkosh found in Northern Elsweyr.  Omu-dar the traveling merchant travels between Sunspire and the Prowl's Edge Dragonscour.
Sunspire has been overrun by dragons. Legend has it that this is the place where Alkosh shouted down Pelinal Whitestrake, leaving behind a timewound. Each boss in this trial will have a unique hardmode.
A golden-scaled dragon, Nahviintaas, has come to the Spire and proclaims himself to be Alkosh. With him are two other dragons: Lokkestiiz, a white dragon, and Yolnahkriin, a red dragon. These two claim to be avatars of the two moons, Jone and Jode, respectively. You are tasked with ending the tyrannical reign of these false-gods.
You must kill Lokkestiiz and Yolnahkriin in order to reach Nahviintaas. You can kill them in either order, and their deaths break the seal that blocks the way to the false-god of time. In order to engage Nahviintaas on hard mode, the other two bosses must first be fought in hard mode before him. Activating hard mode for Lokkestiz and Yolnahkriin will induce Nahviintaas into flying down from his place at the spire to aid them. Completing the trial on veteran will earn you a skin, and completion of a challenger-like achievement will earn you a Senche mount that wears the veteran skin.
You will receive a Pristine Dragon Heartscale with your other rewards for completing this trial on Hard Mode.

BOSS.name: 洛克提兹
BOSS.des: Lokkestiiz is a frost dragon residing in the Sunspire, masquerading as an aspect of Jone. Lokkestiiz is known for his freezing breath.

skills.name: 破裂
skills.des: The Frozen Tomb shatters if a player does not stand in it, causing massive damage to the entire group.

skills.name: 寒霜霆击
skills.des: Lokkestiiz fires ice at people.

skills.name: 冰寒
skills.des: Lokkestiiz has an aura of cold energy around him. When you are close to him, it causes damage.

skills.name: 寒霜吐息
skills.des: Lokkestiiz breathes a blast of frost, indicated by a massive conal AoE.

skills.name: 风暴狂怒
skills.des: Lokkestiiz fires off a beam of lightning during flight.

skills.name: 龙翼抽击
skills.des: Lokkestiiz hits you with his wing if you're too close.

skills.name: Aerial Onslaught
skills.des: At 80%/50%/20% health, Lokkestiiz flies into the air and ceases to be targettable. A large amount of atronachs are summoned into the arena at the same time. From here, Lokkestiiz will perform a strafing run over the arena, breathing electricity that will linger for a time, dealing damage if touched, and will end by performing a massive ice and shock beam that sweeps across the arena, and must be blocked to avoid the immense damage it deals.

skills.name: 召唤寒霜侍灵
skills.des: Summons a Frost Atronach with 3,408,25819,405,160 health.

skills.name: 冰川之拳
skills.des: Very powerful blow from Lokkestiiz's Frost Atronachs which can easily one shot most players. Indicated by a conal aoe.

skills.name: 召唤风暴侍灵
skills.des: Summons a Storm Atronach with 321,8912,874,839 health.

skills.name: 流星
skills.des: The Storm Atronach enters the arena, causing damage if a player is under it when it spawns. Can be blocked.

skills.name: 随时有可能爆炸
skills.des: The Storm Atronach enters execute phase similar to Stormfist. The atronach must be burned down.

skills.name: 风暴围困
skills.des: Lightning-based attack from the Storm Atronach.

BOSS.name: 尤尔纳克林
BOSS.des: Yolnahkriin is a red dragon who is masquerading as an aspect of Jode within the temple of Sunspire.

skills.name: 噬咬
skills.des: Yolnahkriin bites whoever he's targeting.

skills.name: 沸油
skills.des: The boiling oil surrounding Yolnahkriin's perch will damage you if you stand in it.

skills.name: Flame Aura
skills.des: If you are too close to Yolnahkriin (read: underneath him), you will be consumed by raging fire.

skills.name: 火焰吐息
skills.des: Yolnahkriin breathes fire.

skills.name: 专注之火
skills.des: Yolnahkriin will set down an orange aoe onto one player in front of him.  The only way to survive Yolnahkriin's Focused Fire is to find a way to disperse the impact. Damage increases with every hit. Players must stack to distribute the damage. Works similarly to Shade of Siroria's Roaring Flare.

skills.name: 召唤火焰侍灵
skills.des: Summons a Flame Atronach.

skills.name: 召唤铁侍灵
skills.des: Summons an Iron Servant.

skills.name: 龙翼抽击
skills.des: One hit kill, can connect if you fight from the side.

skills.name: Aerial Blast
skills.des: At 80%/50%/25% health, Yolnahkriin flies into the air and ceases to be targettable, as more atronachs appear in the arena. While fighting the atronachs, Yolnahkriin then proceeds to spew concentrated fire down into the center of the arena, covering all of it except for the outer rim, limiting room to move around and dealing massive damage if stepping into the fire.

BOSS.name: 纳温塔丝
BOSS.des: Nahviintaas is a golden dragon who has taken over the temple of the Sunspire alongside his dragon followers by posing as the Dragon God Alkosh.

skills.name: Summon Allies
skills.des: At the start of the fight, Nahviintaas remains in the air and cannot be targetted. A group consisting of Alkosh's Fates, Alkosh's Wills, Furies of Alkosh, and Ruins of Alkosh appear in the arena and must be defeated. After the inital group is defeated.

skills.name: 熔火流星
skills.des: After the initial wave of adds are defeated, a set of three fire explosion go off in the center of the arena, increasing in size after each one, with the last being so large and powerful that you must hide behind the statues in the arena to avoid the damage. Flame Atronachs start appearing at the same time as this ability.

skills.name: 噬咬
skills.des: A basic melee attack.

skills.name: 火球
skills.des: A basic ranged attack.

skills.name: 龙翼抽击
skills.des: Standing near Nahviintaas' wings can lead to him swatting you with them, dealing high damage and knocking you away, possibly off of the arena.

skills.name: 火焰吐息
skills.des: Nahviintaas breathes fire in front of him, indicated by a conal AoE.

skills.name: Flame Sweep
skills.des: A wider version of Flame Breath, which is slower but covers the entire arena, and if this version hits you, you are stunned.

skills.name: Head Swipe
skills.des: Nahviintaas winds his head up before swinging it down in an arc motion, dealing damage and knocking you away.

skills.name: Timeshift
skills.des: At 90%/70%/50% health, three portals appear in the arena floor and three players must use them to be teleported in a separate reality where they must fight and defeat an Eternal Servant within 90 seconds. Yellow magical swirls will appear sometimes in the arena and stepping on them grants additional time to defeat the enemy. If the Eternal Servant isn't defeated within the time limit, it will be transported into the main arena in an immune state and will wipe the party. While the three players are fighting in the other reality, the same kind of adds that appeared initially will attack the rest of the party.

skills.name: 飞离
skills.des: At 80%/60%/40% health, Naahviintaas flies into the air and ceases to be targettable again, and the fight loops back to how it was initially, with the add waves and Molten Meteor.

skills.name: Meteor Shower
skills.des: Once Nahviintaas reaches 30% health, he starts using this new ability where meteors will fall on every single member of the party, and they must split up to avoid stacking meteors over each other. After the meteors have landed into the ground, they linger for some time, with a pulsing field of fire around them. In hard mode, the meteors last long enough that another wave of meteors can arrive while older ones are still present, which can start limiting available space in the arena.

skills.name: 召唤侍灵
skills.des: Flame Atronachs will continuously appear into the arena to assist Nahviintaas.

skills.name: Flame Aura
skills.des: A circular aura is present underneath Nahviintaas for the whole duration of the fight while he is grounded, inflicting constant damage if standing too close.

achievement.name: 太阳尖顶样式大师
achievement.des: 学习太阳尖顶样式书的每一章，该样式书出现在太阳尖顶试炼中。

achievement.name: 太阳尖顶屠龙
achievement.des: 完成列出的太阳尖顶成就。

achievement.name: 太阳尖顶已完成
achievement.des: 在太阳尖顶中，击败尤尔纳克林、洛克提兹和纳温塔丝。

achievement.name: 太阳尖顶征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，击败尤尔纳克林、洛克提兹和纳温塔丝。

achievement.name: 太阳尖顶胜利者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，在熄灭目标的所有祭祀火盆后击败尤尔纳克林、洛克提兹和纳温塔丝。

achievement.name: 太阳尖顶冲刺者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，在进入太阳尖顶前厅和庭院之间的走廊后30分钟内，击败尤尔纳克林、洛克提兹和纳温塔丝，以及除此之外的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 太阳尖顶弑神者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，在熄灭目标的所有祭祀火盆后，于进入太阳尖顶前厅和庭院之间的走廊后30分钟内，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败尤尔纳克林、洛克提兹和纳温塔丝，以及他们的所有追随者。

achievement.name: 森切战猫杀戮者
achievement.des: 在太阳尖顶中，击败100个艾尔克许的咆哮、乔恩的风爪或乔德的火牙。

achievement.name: 龙裔消灭者
achievement.des: 在太阳尖顶中，击败200个艾尔克许的命运、意志、怒火或毁灭。

achievement.name: 趁热打铁
achievement.des: 在太阳尖顶中，在消灭被激怒的铁仆从之后，击败尤尔纳克林。

achievement.name: 比闪电还快
achievement.des: 在太阳尖顶中，在没有任何小队成员被风暴吐息命中的情况下击败洛克提兹。

achievement.name: 保持同步
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，在没有任何小队成员时间迁移穿过同一个时间裂隙超过一次的情况下，击败纳温塔丝。

achievement.name: 灭火
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，在熄灭尤尔纳克林的祭祀火盆后将他击败。

achievement.name: 风暴追逐者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，在熄灭洛克提兹的祭祀火盆后将他击败。

achievement.name: 龙之克星
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）太阳尖顶中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败尤尔纳克林、洛克提兹和纳温塔丝，以及除此之外的所有敌人。

name: 洛克汗的巨口
mystery: 一个叫做“七谜神庙”的古老虎人神龛已被虎人的宿敌堕落虎人占领。随着时间的流逝，越来越多的迷失之猫通过世界之间的裂隙涌入奈恩。如果要拯救泰姆瑞尔，就必须关上这个洛克汗的巨口。
des:
The Maw of Lorkhaj is a desecrated Khajiiti temple in Reaper's March.
It was known as the "Temple of Seven Riddles" prior to its occupation by the Dro-m'Athra.
Just outside the entrance to the temple is a small hub with two merchants, crafting stations and a cooking fire. There are also some members of the Twilight Cantors nearby, and a few monks that have been afflicted by the Bent Dance. Adara'hai can be found in front of the entrance to the temple; she will request your help in dealing with the invading dro'm-Athra.
You will receive The Rid-Thar's Moon Pearls along with your other rewards after defeating the Fang of Lorkhaj with Hard Mode engaged.

BOSS.name: 遗忘者扎哈撒
BOSS.des: Zhaj'hassa the Forgotten is a large Dro-m'Athra found within the Maw of Lorkhaj. He serves as the first boss that must be defeated to progress.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: The boss swings its weapon, doing moderate physical damage. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 暴怒横劈
skills.des: The boss swings its weapon in an arc, doing moderate physical damage to everyone in front of him. If taunted the boss will be forced to use this attack on the tank only.

skills.name: 黑暗石柱
skills.des: The boss slams its weapon on the ground, and a blue pillar emerges from a location as indicated by a red circle. When the pillar emerges it will damage and knock back any player standing on top of it.

skills.name: 雷霆冲击
skills.des: The boss slams its weapon on the ground, dealing high damage to his target.

skills.name: 洛克汗之握
skills.des: The boss throws three blue orbs on three random players. These players will have red circles around them indicating they are targeted. Any player within the circles will gain a debuff that turns their screen blue and does moderate magical damage over time. The players affected have to stand on the glowing pads at the side of the room to remove the debuff. Failure to do so will result in instant death after some time.

skills.name: 潜入黑暗
skills.des: Once Grip of Lorkhaj is cleansed, blue orbs will travel along the floor of the room. Touching these orbs will deal moderate magical damage to that player.

skills.name: Summon Ghostly Sar-m'Athra
skills.des: At 80%, 60%, 40% and 20% health, the boss will summon 2, 3, 4, or 5 Ghostly Sar-m'Athras to attack the group. These should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 虚无爆炸
skills.des: The boss channels holds his weapon up and channels a large explosion. Players will need to hide behind the blue pillars summoned earlier to avoid instant death. Note as the fight progresses fewer and fewer pillars will appear, and eventually no pillars will happen. If that happens, players have to kill the boss before the final explosion wipes the whole group.

skills.name: Dark Aegis/Shadow Burst
skills.des: At 70% and 30% health, the boss summons a shield around himself and small red circles appear around all players. The circles will pulse for high damage over time. Stacking is not recommended here as overlapping the red damage circles may lead to death. Players will have to break through the damage shield to stop this phase, before the damage increases and wipes the group.

BOSS.name: 斯金莱
BOSS.des:
S'kinrai is a large Dro-m'Athra found within the Maw of Lorkhaj. Together with Vashai, he serves as the second boss that must be defeated to progress.
According to Adara'hai, he and Vashai are twins, and used the Sanctuary as a dojo before falling to the Bent Dance.

skills.name: 恐怖横劈
skills.des: S'kinrai's basic attack. He will swing his weapon around, doing moderate physical damage to all players in front of him. This attack has no red cone indicator.

skills.name: 月之猛击
skills.des: S'kinrai charges a heavy attack which deals very high physical damage and knocks back. This can be blocked to stagger S'kinrai instead.

skills.name: 月之毁灭
skills.des: S'kinrai will cast a Radiant Destruction-like beam on a random player that stuns and deals ticks of moderate flame damage over time. You cannot break-free of the stun yourself so other party members have to interrupt this spell as soon as possible.

skills.name: 月之闪光术
skills.des: S'kinrai casts a Reflective Light-like ability which launches a yellow orb at two players, dealing moderate flame damage on impact and reducing healing then ticks of low flame damage over time. Be aware that the color one-shot attack is also called "Lunar Flare".

skills.name: 月亮之相
skills.des: S'kinrai will always have a bright aura around his head (as visible in the image above), and shortly after the beginning of the fight he will grant Lunar Aspect to the six nearest players. DPS players are advised that to not attack him while you share the bright aura with him, as all damage you do will be greatly reduced. Instead, the tanks will switch bosses. The tank with Lunar Aspect will pull Vashai and vice versa.

skills.name: Infernal Combustion
skills.des: Likewise, players near Vashai will gain a dark aura around them. If two players of opposite auras get near each other, both players die and explode for high magical damage in a large radius. Thus players of opposite colors should stay separate from each other. The aura persists through death, so if a bright aura player dies, the corpse will be bright. If a dark aura player revives that player, both will explode the moment the bright player gets up. To minimize this, players should only revive players of the same aura as them.

skills.name: 变色
skills.des: An additional mechanic that only appears in vet mode, S'kinrai will randomly select three players near him that are dark and switch their auras to bright. Vashai will also do the same but reversed. The players affected will have a yellowish circle appear around them warning them of the incoming color swap, and those players have to quickly move away from others to prevent Infernal Combustion. Players who have their auras switched to dark will have to move across the room to the other side to attack Vashai and vice versa.

skills.name: 爆炸
skills.des: Vashai and S'kinrai will eventually teleport to opposite ends of the room, dividing the room into a dark and a bright half down the middle. S'kinrai's half will have a dark floor and vice versa. After a short time both bosses will explode for high magical damage. Players must avoid this by standing on the half with the floor color matching your own aura. After the explosion, all auras are removed from all players. The bosses will then reapply the auras as mentioned above and the fight repeats. A common strategy for this encounter is to divide the trial group into two subgroups of six each. Each subgroup has a tank holding one boss. After the auras are applied, the tanks use Inner Fire to taunt the boss that has the opposite aura as the one of their subgroup, causing the correct boss to come over to their side.

skills.name: Summon Will of Vashai
skills.des: He also is able to summon a Will of Vashai to aid him. The enemy summoned will have a dark aura, and only bright aura players will be able to kill it. The enemy should be killed quickly to simplify the fight.

skills.name: 阴影燃烧
skills.des: Both Vashai and S'kinrai have to be killed at roughly the same time, as once one dies the other will begin casting Shadow Blaze. This uninterruptible spell takes a while to cast and players must kill the remaining boss before it fires. Failure to do so will likely result in instant death for the whole group. Most groups will coordinate DPS between the two subgroups to ensure that the remaining boss can be finished off quickly once his twin dies.

BOSS.name: 拉卡特
BOSS.des:
Rakkhat, The Fang of Lorkhaj, is a powerful dro-m'Athra found within the Maw of Lorkhaj. He emerges after you confront Kulan-dro in the High Lunarium. He takes the form of a large Grievous Twilight with glowing blue stripes and serves as the trial's final boss.
Upon his defeat, his loot will appear in a reward chest near the wall in the back of the room. If you fail to get the quest from Adara'hai at the start of the trial, your loot will include an Ancient Lunar Talisman, which you can activate from your inventory to begin the quest. This exists as a failsafe to ensure you can get your weekly coffer for completing the trial, even if you forget to talk to Adara'hai or accept a quest share from one of your groupmates.

skills.name: 虚无领域
skills.des: During the fight, shadowy images of ritualists will appear in the center of the room. Some players then need to pass through the gate to the back of the room, and defeat a total of six Void Callers (who spawn on circular mats that are embroidered with moons and adorned with pillows) are also making motions as though casting a spell. The runners need to activate the Eyes of Jode synergy to see the Void Callers. The dancing Bent Cats present within the Void only serve as a distraction and should be ignored. While the shadowy ritualists are present, the lunar images on the floor will begin to darken, and the ritualists will eventually sink into the ground. If the players in the void fail to kill the Void Callers in time, the ritualists will disappear, and Rakkhat will cast Void Sphere, which eliminates the group.

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：月之勇士
achievement.des: 完成所有与击败（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口中的“洛克汗的獠牙”拉卡特相关的成就。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口中，击败“洛克汗的獠牙”拉卡特和他的堕落虎人军团。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口（困难模式）
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口中，在月之神龛强化拉卡特之后，将其击败。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：瞄准獠牙
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口中，在至少有三个堕落虎人恐怖追猎者存活的情况下击败拉卡特。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：躲避虚无
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口中，在不超过两名玩家受到过洛克汗之息影响的情况下击败拉卡特。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：双月之舞
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口中，在两个月亮周期内迫使拉卡特进入他的最后阶段，然后击败他。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口已完成
achievement.des: 在普通模式中，将堕落虎人赶回虚无并关闭洛克汗的巨口。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：暗影杀戮者
achievement.des: 在洛克汗的巨口击败25个虚无召唤者。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：纯洁的灵魂
achievement.des: 在受到洛克汗之息影响时，在无人死亡的情况下击败拉卡特。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：完美的胜利
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下完成（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口。

achievement.name: 洛克汗的巨口：奔放的伏击
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口中，在10秒内使用两个链条开关，然后击败堕落虎人入侵者。

achievement.name: 限时试炼：洛克汗的巨口
achievement.des: 在40分钟的时间限制内完成（老兵模式）洛克汗的巨口。试炼将在通过七谜语神庙的门槛时开始。

name: 云栖城
mystery: 云栖城，高精灵的鹫巢，坐落于夏暮岛最高峰伊顿尼尔的高坡之上。不知为何，其稀薄的空气就如同冰镇的奈恩根酒一样令人陶醉和振奋。
des:
Cloudrest is a city found on the mountain of Eton Nir in Summerset, east of Ebon Stadmont. It serves as the home base for the Welkynar Gryphon Knights and their Aerie.
Due to an unforeseen catastrophe, the once-thriving city stands cloaked in a toxic, purple mist. To ensure that the corruption does not spread to the rest of the island, the city is under quarantine by the Divine Prosecution, who were forced to evacuate the city and barricade the main gate.
A cart from Alinor can be taken to get there, and a side entrance lies straight to the west: there is a note found next to it.
You will receive a Crest of the Welkynar for completing this trial on hard mode.

BOSS.name: 加伦韦幽影
BOSS.des:
The Shade of Galenwe is a shadowy clone of the Welkynar Knight Galenwe, created by Z'Maja. He serves as an optional boss, though defeating him will make the battle with Z'Maja easier.
He is initially seen kneeling with a slight forcefield and numerous Yaghra around him, and defeating those creatures will cause him to enter combat and summon his shadow gryphon, the Shade of Falarielle.

skills.name: 寒冰尖刺
skills.des: Galenwe will jump to the furthest player away from him and release a circle of ice that deals significant damage. If a player is not blocking this attack, they will be knocked back but if they are blocking they will be staggered. Players can move out of the aoe indicator before Galenwe lands the attack to take no damage.

skills.name: 荒野之风
skills.des: Galenwe will put his sword in the ground and begin to channel an attack. Small aoe ice spikes that do significant damage will appear under the feet of random players until he stops his attack or is interrupted by a player.

skills.name: 寒冰牢笼
skills.des: Galenwe drops an ice ring around himself that does a large initial hit and stacking damage if stood in. A player can dodge roll through the ring to get in or out of it, but will still take some damage.

skills.name: 寒霜光环
skills.des: Galenwe will pause and summon an ice aura around him that does light aoe damage to anyone standing in it.

skills.name: 凛冬之相
skills.des: At 60% health on veteran difficulty, Galenwe will stop and do an uninterruptible channel. Three random players will be chosen and have growing aoe circles at their feet. Upon the end of the cast, those players and everybody inside the aoe will have a meteor strike them. If this attack is not blocked, it will knock a player down and stun them. It is important to take these meteors away from players if possible, especially other players targeted by meteors. Overlapping meteors will kill any player caught in the overlap. The meteor mechanic intentionally excludes anybody who has taunt on a boss and any player within Z'Maja's Shadow Realm.

skills.name: 毁灭一击
skills.des: Galenwe's heavy attack. Deals major physical damage and must be blocked.

BOSS.name: 瑞利昆恩幽影
BOSS.des: The Shade of Relequen is the shadow clone of the Welkynar, Relequen. He uses his lightning staff to attack and fights alongside the shade of Belanaril, his mortal counterpart's gryphon companion.

skills.name: Flux Burst and Static Diffusion
skills.des: Relequen will jump to the furthest player away. Unlike the other two riders, this happens instantly. He will leave behind a large shock aoe that does moderate damage. If a player is too far away, this ability can be outranged and Relequen will jump to the second furthest player in radius.

skills.name: 震撼猛击
skills.des: Relequen will spin his staff and then slam it onto his target, or if dodged onto the ground. This impact will cause several small lightning aoes to fan out in a starburst from the impact point. Players hit by these aoes will take moderate damage and be stunned.

skills.name: 直流电
skills.des: Relequen will channel and several lightning bolts will form a line to random players. After a brief duration, these lightning bolts will stun and do severe aoe damage to the players targeted. If the aoes around players overlap, they may be oneshot.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.des: A long conal attack will extend out from Relequen and knock back any player who is not blocking. If a player is blocking, they will be staggered.

skills.name: Mage's Wrath
skills.des: If a player is low on health, Relequen may target them with the Sorcerer execute Mage's Wrath. There is a five second grace period to heal the target to full, otherwise it will deal the full execute damage to a target, even if healed above the normal threshold for an execute mechanic.

BOSS.name: 希罗利亚幽影
BOSS.des: The Shade of Siroria is a shadowy clone of the Welkynar Knight Siroria, created by Z'Maja. She serves as an optional boss, though defeating her will make the battle with Z'Maja easier. When engaged, she will summon her gryphon, the Shade of Silaeda

skills.name: 烈焰吐息
skills.des: Mimics the Dragon Knight Engulfing Flames ability. This attack is a conal ability that severely debuffs any player hit to take increased damage from other flame damage.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: Melee ability, deals physical damage.

skills.name: 熔岩鞭
skills.des: Melee ability, deals flame damage.

skills.name: 下劈斩
skills.des: Melee ability, deals physical damage.

skills.name: 黑暗利爪
skills.des: Siroria casts Dark Talons and roots any player within range of her and applies a dot. This ability can be purged away by player abilities that purge debuffs.

skills.name: 龙骑士战旗
skills.des: Siroria casts Dragonknight Standard and a large aoe that looks like a player standard will appear and do severe damage to anyone standing in the radius. While standing in the aoe of her Standard, Siroria's other abilities are empowered significantly to the point they can even one-shot tanks.

skills.name: 炽热割裂
skills.des: Siroria's heavy attack, like the other riders, is a one-shot if not blocked by the tank, and must be dodge rolled by the non-tanks if targeted.

skills.name: Fulminate/Burgeoning Blaze
skills.des: Starting at 60% health on veteran difficulty, Siroria will leap into the air and land at the spot where the farthest player away was standing when she cast the ability. Upon landing she does a high damage shockwave that sends four roving fire tornadoes out from the center point. The tornadoes spin out in random directions and cause high damage to any target hit before vanishing.

BOSS.name: 泽玛亚
BOSS.des:
Z'Maja is a Sea Sload sorceress of the Abyssal Cabal who is encountered in the central chamber of Cloudrest. She has taken control of the Welkynar Gryphon Knights, transforming them into shadowy monsters that possess all of their formidable skills. She is also responsible for releasing a mysterious purple mist that has spread throughout the city.
The Shadowcaster has wrested control of Cloudrest's Aerie, the Welkynars' grand meeting hall. There, you will face her. The amulet embedded in her chest supplies her with great power, and was given to her by Nocturnal.[1]:146

skills.name: 暗影之渠
skills.des: Z'Maja creates a teleportation pool at her current location and a second pool from which to pop out of at a second location.

skills.name: 心灵爆轰
skills.des: A telekinetic projectile that targets a single person. If a player is hit by Mind Blast 4 times within 15 seconds, they'll suffer a DoT called Leeching Shadow on the fourth strike. While this ability targets a single person, it also creates a cone-shaped AoE in front of her that damages anyone within range for slightly less than Mind Blast's base damage.[1]:148

skills.name: 吸血暗影
skills.des: Lasting for 8 seconds, damage from this DoT decreases with each tick.

skills.name: 黑暗法球
skills.des: Spawns three small orbs that will stun any player who touches them. If the orbs are not destroyed in time they will converge and target a player, stunning them and releasing Sinister Beads. Note that when an orb is destroyed it inflicts players with damage-over-time effect. The number of players affected by this damage-over-time will increase if more mini bosses are fought alongside Z'Maja, with no players being afflicted if Z'maja is fought on her own.

skills.name: 阴险之珠
skills.des: If the Dark Orbs collide with either each other or a player, they will explode into a number of dark beads. These will stun and place a damage over time on those hit.

skills.name: 极渊之暗
skills.des: An ability that targets the tank who is currently taunting her, and the player furthest from her, creating a void beneath their feet.

skills.name: 暗灭爆破
skills.des: If the shadow portal is not closed quickly enough by destroying the Tenebrous Vessels within, all players will begin to helplessly levitate under Z'Maja's control and she will instantly kill the entire group.

skills.name: 处决阶段
skills.des: One she reaches 10% health, Z'Maja unleashes the full power of her amulet by cracking it open.[1]:148 This summons her shade to the real world. Approximately every 22 seconds she will afflict 6 members of the group with Baneful Mark, which reduces the healing taken and damage done by all those inflicted until they return to 100% health.

skills.name: 诺克图娜的青睐
skills.des: This attack damages whoever she's facing and has aggro on (whoever she's selected as a target to attack): she conjures a powerful blast of shadow energy in front of herself and thrusts it towards her target. There is a long animation for this attack. It is a very high damage projectile that cannot be dodged or reflected. Due to the high damage, it will kill any character that is not blocking, and frequently kill lower health players through block. Generally speaking, the tank holding taunt on Z'Maja should be the only person being affected by this ability; everybody else in the group should be behind Z'Maja so they're not in range.

skills.name: 暗影飞散
skills.des: Z'Maja waves her hands, channeling a spell. After a few seconds, she settles into a rhythm, and random players are sucked into a vortex and dropped from a random spot in the air, taking fall damage. If she's allowed to continue casting, she'll drag more players into the vortex, becoming more of a nuisance. This ability must be interrupted so Z'Maja doesn't interrupt the flow of battle and kill your damage dealers. On Veteran, the teleportation height is raised, which makes your group members take more fall damage when they're teleported into the air.

skills.name: 悲鸣反击
skills.des: In Veteran Cloudrest, if a player dies and someone tries to resurrect the dead ally before defeating their Shade, the person attempting the resurrection will take increasing damage from Grievous Retaliation.

skills.name: 黑暗玷污
skills.des: On Veteran, if you attempt to enter the Shadow World twice in the span of two minutes, you'll immediately die upon your second entry. Of this, the death recap combat tips say the following: "Repeated exposure to Z'Maja's realm of shadow in a short period of time results in a catastrophic breakdown of the body."

achievement.name: 威尔肯纳尔样式大师
achievement.des: 学习威尔肯纳尔样式书的每一章，该样式书偶尔作为完成云栖城试炼的奖励出现。

achievement.name: 云栖城救星
achievement.des: 完成列出的云栖城成就。

achievement.name: 云栖城已完成
achievement.des: 在云栖城中击败泽玛亚、希罗利亚、瑞利昆恩和加伦韦。

achievement.name: 云栖城征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中击败泽玛亚、希罗利亚、瑞利昆恩和加伦韦。

achievement.name: 云栖城胜利者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在同一场战斗中击败泽玛亚、希罗利亚、瑞利昆恩和加伦韦。

achievement.name: 快速蛞蝓人杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在15分钟的时间限制内击败泽玛亚、希罗利亚、瑞利昆恩和加伦韦。当玩家进入云栖城鹫巢时开始计时。

achievement.name: 从暗影中幸存
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败泽玛亚、希罗利亚、瑞利昆恩和加伦韦。

achievement.name: 每人只能一个核心
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在每个小队成员只拾取和摧毁一个恶毒核心的情况下击败泽玛亚。

achievement.name: 有难同当
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在与身边有着全部三个威尔肯纳尔幽影协战的泽玛亚战斗时，一个受尖啸冰霜影响和其他两名受高压过载影响的玩家分担咆哮闪光爆发的伤害。

achievement.name: 光影之战
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在与身边有着希罗利亚幽影协战的泽玛亚战斗时，利用咆哮闪光并达成对亡者的暗影的20次致命一击。

achievement.name: 核心协调
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在与泽玛亚战斗时，在激活一个威尔肯纳尔之光后，再激活两个威尔肯纳尔之光，并在接下来的6秒内摧毁三个恶毒核心。

achievement.name: 深海怪封锁
achievement.des: 在云栖城中，在一个暗影之界事件期间与泽玛亚战斗时，阻止所有深海怪进入大门和入侵凡世领域15次。

achievement.name: 云栖城争夺者
achievement.des: 在云栖城中，在同一场战斗中击败泽玛亚、希罗利亚、瑞利昆恩和加伦韦。

achievement.name: 共赴火海
achievement.des: 在云栖城中，在与希罗利亚的幽影单独战斗时，在整场战斗中，每次咆哮闪光必须被至少6个玩家分担。

achievement.name: 惊人直觉
achievement.des: 在云栖城中，在与瑞利昆恩的幽影单独战斗时，在整场战斗中，没有玩家被高压过载命中，也没有玩家将高压电流传播给其他玩家。

achievement.name: 奥秘之冰
achievement.des: 在云栖城中，让加伦韦的幽影用他的寒冰尖刺攻击摧毁20个游荡的尖啸冰霜旋风。

achievement.name: 蛞蝓人和她的幽影
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在泽玛亚身边有一个威尔肯纳尔幽影协战的情况下击败她。

achievement.name: 致命三角组合
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在泽玛亚身边有两个威尔肯纳尔幽影协战的情况下击败她。

achievement.name: 通往阿拉克松的道路
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）云栖城中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，于进入云栖城鹫巢后15分钟内的同一场战斗中击败泽玛亚、希罗利亚、瑞利昆恩和加伦韦。

name: 理智边缘
mystery: “作为所有希望、梦想和恐惧的来源，心灵是一处不断变幻的景观。同时它也是我们最大的财富、盟友和敌人。祈祷你的心灵永远不会背叛你吧。”——巫师特尔乌万
des:
Sanity's Edge is the dreamworld of Warlock Vanton.  It is a trial and can be entered via Vanton's wizard tower on the Telvanni Peninsula, southwest of Alavelis.
You will receive a Crystallized Memory with your other rewards for completing this trial on Hard Mode.

BOSS.name: 主教亚赛拉
BOSS.des: Exarchanic Yaseyla is the first boss of Sanity's Edge and leader of the Contramagis Militia. Her ultimate desire is the death of all mages. In her manifesto, it's revealed that her daughter, Javalla, was afflicted with a wasting disease. Wizard Twelvane offered her a potion to ease the child's suffering, but Javalla died despite the treatment. She hates all mages, but has a particular distaste for Twelvane.

BOSS.name: 首席巫师特尔乌万
BOSS.des: Archwizard Twelvane is a Khajiit mage found within Sanity's Edge. Despite the similarities in appearance, she is not Wizard Twelvane, but a hostile figment of Warlock Vanton's imagination.

BOSS.name: 折磨者安苏尔
BOSS.des:
Ansuul the Tormentor is a Gloam Knight who appears throughout Sanity's Edge as the main antagonist. She is a creature of nightmare who is attempting to break free of her prison within an artifact known as the Dreamstone.
