To achieve this, she has taken control of Warlock Vanton's mind and is attempting to break through into Tamriel. You must enter Vanton's dreamworld to defeat Ansuul and save him.
Ansuul appears throughout the trial as a projection, either to speak directly to your group or as part of one of Vanton's fragmented memories of his dealings with the creature. She can also be observed as a giant red specter in the sky above the surreal landscapes within Sanity's Edge, observing your group from above.
You will face her within The Twisted Memory, the final section of the trial, where she serves as the final boss.

skills.name: 仪式爆裂
skills.des: While she's summmoning one of the three mazes, Ansuul charges up a blast in a massive cone in front of her. The group must run to the opposite wall to avoid staning in the blast radius. The blast is a one-hit KO.

skills.name: 神经管控
skills.des: If you don't stop Ansuul from convincing Vanton to give in during the maze segment, your group is destroyed.

achievement.name: 理智沉着
achievement.des: 完成列出的全部理智边缘成就。

achievement.name: 理智边缘胜利者
achievement.des: 在理智边缘击败主教亚赛拉、首席巫师特尔乌万和折磨者安苏尔。

achievement.name: 理智边缘征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘击败主教亚赛拉、首席巫师特尔乌万、折磨者安苏尔。

achievement.name: 坚韧梦想者
achievement.des: 在单轮（老兵模式）理智边缘中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败主教亚赛拉、首席巫师特尔乌万、折磨者安苏尔。

achievement.name: 理智边缘疾行者
achievement.des: Defeat all enemies in addition to Exarchanic Yaseyla, Archwizard Twelvane, and Ansuul the Tormentor in Veteran Sanity's Edge within 35 minutes. Your time begins when you enter Vanton's Nightmare.

achievement.name: 清醒梦境
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘中，无小队成员死亡的情况下，成功击败主教亚赛拉、首席巫师特尔乌万、折磨者安苏尔以及所有其他敌人。

achievement.name: 心灵大师
achievement.des: Defeat Exarchanic Yaseyla, Archwizard Twelvane, and Ansuul the Tormentor along with all their hostile followers after raising the challenge banner for each of them, without suffering a group member death, within 35 minutes of entering Veteran Sanity's Edge.

achievement.name: 梦魇杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘中击败125个打断者、虚空之主、召唤师、屠夫、执法者。

achievement.name: 偏执杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘中击败50个偏执者。

achievement.name: 正念想象
achievement.des: 在理智边缘，八位不同的玩家必须在与主教亚赛拉战斗的同时使用威顿的清醒击杀恐惧。

achievement.name: 星体周期
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘与首席巫师特尔乌万的遭遇战期间，作为一个团队，始终正确输入正确的水晶控制序列。

achievement.name: 医学死亡
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘于首席巫师特尔乌万的遭遇战期间，奇美拉一旦复活就不再回到雕像状态。

achievement.name: 清醒之声
achievement.des: 在理智边缘中，在与折磨者安苏尔的遭遇战期间，进入威顿的磨难7次。

achievement.name: 无畏理智
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘中，在与折磨者安苏尔的遭遇战期间，以少于4名玩家的队伍完成每一个磨难。

achievement.name: 团体治疗
achievement.des: 在理智边缘中和折磨者安苏尔战斗时，让11名玩家在一场迷宫运行中抵达终点。

achievement.name: 法师保卫者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败主教亚赛拉。

achievement.name: 梦境毁灭者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）理智边缘中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败首席巫师特尔乌万。

name: 制造大厅
mystery: 据说索萨希尔的构造室能够分析梦达思位面的一切事物，无论是有机物还是无机物，然后以发条机械的形式复制出来。
des:
The Halls of Fabrication are a part of Sotha Sil's Clockwork City.
The Halls are an enormous processing facility that produces and iterates the designs for Sotha Sil's machines and reprocesses their material. At one point their functions included the refactoring of material from Dwemer machines, but Sotha Sil suspended this practice at some point in the past.
The facility is governed by its central intelligence, the Assembly General, which continues to process and redesign the Clockwork machines alone.
A portal to the facility opened in Nirn within Abanabi Cave, spewing out fabricants which decimated the local wildlife, and threatened Divayth Fyr's expansion of Tel Fyr.
You will receive a Divaricated Tone Fork for defeating the Assembly General with hard mode activated.

BOSS.name: 猎杀者博西特洛克斯
BOSS.des:
Hunter-Killer Positrox is a verminous fabricant who, together with Hunter-Killer Negatrix, acts as the first boss of the Halls of Fabrication.
If both Fabricants are close to each other, they form a link which strengthens them,[verification needed] but also is the only way to dispel the damage shield on the Refabricated Spheres that spawn during the fight. It is advised that one tank keeps one of the Fabricants in the middle of the room, while the other tank kites the second one around, creating the link to destroy any spheres that spawns. They will also cause a debuff which drains more health the longer it is active, and should be dispelled as soon as possible.
Once they are killed, a chest spawns at the front of the room they are in. The Pinnacle Factotum appears from the planar rift shortly afterwards.

skills.name: 震荡
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 荷电刺伤
skills.des: The fabricant rushes at you and impales you with its horn, dealing high physical damage and bleed damage over time.

skills.name: 劈裂之跃
skills.des: The fabricant leaps at you if standing further away, dealing high physical damage and knocking you on the ground.

skills.name: 电击鞭笞
skills.des: The fabricant swipes its tail at you, dealing high physical damage. The tail swipe produces a wave of traveling lightning, which leads into the next ability, Static Cascade.

skills.name: 静电残留
skills.des: The fabricant headbutts the ground, causing a field of electricity to appear, indicated by a large circular AoE, dealing continuous high shock damage.

skills.name: 静电传递
skills.des: Getting hit by the traveling lightning from Shock Lash deals high shock damage each

skills.name: Empowering Beam
skills.des: A beam of blue energy forms when the two fabricants are close together, greatly increasing their damage output.

skills.name: Summons Spheres
skills.des: Throughout the fight, Refabricated Spheres will appear in the arena to aid the bosses. They are buffed with an impenetrable damage shield. The only way to remove the shield is to bring the bosses close together to arm their Empowering Beam, and make the beam touch the spheres, which instantly removes the damage shield.

skills.name: Summon Shalks
skills.des: At 75%/50%/25% health (of the combined heath bar), a large swarm of Shalk Fabricants are summoned into the arena to aid the bosses.

skills.name: 折断
skills.des: If one of the bosses is killed while the other is alive, the remaining fabricant enters an enraged state that massively increases their outgoing damage, to a near lethal-level.

BOSS.name: 巅峰机械人
BOSS.des: The Pinnacle Factotum is a Factotum encountered in the Halls of Fabrication after Hunter-Killer Positrox and Hunter-Killer Negatrix are defeated, serving as the second boss of the trial.

BOSS.name: 大监管者
BOSS.des: The Archcustodian is a large Dwarven Spider found at the Halls of Fabrication. It is the third boss of the trial.

skills.name: 蒸发协议
skills.des: At the start of the fight, the Archcustodian appears surrounded by a large field of energy which grants it an impenetrable damage shield and therefore is invulnerable. Standing in the field of energy deals continuous very high shock damage. To dispel the shield, lure it further down the hallway, and activate the Shock Pylons. After the shield is removed, the Archcustodian becomes stunned for a moderate duration, allowing for a burn phase, before the shield becomes active again. Each time the Archcustodian regains its shield, its walk speed increases.

skills.name: Spinning Traps
skills.des: Throughout the entirety of the fight, spinning blade traps will move about the arena, indicated by large circular AoEs, dealing continuous high physical damage and snaring you if touched.

skills.name: Summon Factotums
skills.des: After each burn phases is complete and the Archcustodian is walking again, Calefactors and Dissectors are summoned to aid the boss.

BOSS.name: 反应器人
BOSS.des: The Reactor is a Factotum encountered together with the Reclaimer and the Reducer in the Halls of Fabrication, where they serve as the fourth boss encounter of the trial.

skills.name: 敲击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing moderate physical damage.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: A powerful melee attack dealing very high physical damage and knocking you away. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 紧握肢体
skills.des: The Reactor periodically sends out rolling bits of electricity by planting his sword into the ground. They deal high shock damage on the way to their destination, indicated by smaller traveling AoEs. Where they burst, reanimated construct limbs will appear, dealing continuous physical damage and stunning nearby players, indicated by circular AoEs.

skills.name: Empowering Beam
skills.des: If near any of the other two constructs, they form a link which strengthens both of them, increasing their damage output and resistance. They should therefore be kept separate.

skills.name: 超载
skills.des: At certain health thresholds (70%, 40%, and 20%), each of them will overcharge and be immune to all damage. Once all three enemies are overcharged, bringing them together will reverse that, allowing them to be damaged again, as well as offering a burn window while they are briefly stunned.

BOSS.name: 组装将军
BOSS.des:
The Assembly General is a Dwarven Colossus serving as the final boss of the Halls of Fabrication. Though technically an artificial intelligence in charge of reassembly, it will control a physical body during the fight, and must be dealt with while Divayth Fyr attempts to hack its main console.
The Assembly General remains rooted in place throughout the fight, except when moving places during transitions, but has many attacks that can both reach in front of itself on the floor as well as on the upper levels on its sides, as well as being able to attack both areas at the same time with its limbs. It also controls the Truncation Appendage, Ventilation System, and Whirring Blade Traps in the Core Assembly

skills.name: 炮弹投射物
skills.des: The Assembly General shoots out multiple lightning orbs throughout the arena, both on the upper platforms and the floor, indicated by several medium-sized circular AoEs, dealing high shock damage. More projectiles are sent out after the boss loses its arms

skills.name: Energy Propulsion
skills.des: The Assembly General expulses a large amount of excess energy behind itself, as indicated by a massive rectangular AoE, dealing very large physical damage.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: If you are standing on the floor, the Assembly General performs a massive uppercut, dealing massive physical damage and launching you across the arena if not blocked or avoided.

skills.name: Grasping Stomp
skills.des: If you are standing on the floor, the Assembly General stomps the floor with its right foot, sending out grasping tendrils across the floor, indicated by traveling circular AoEs. If touched by one, it inflicts moderate physical damage and immobilizes and primes you for further attacks.

skills.name: Quake Stomp
skills.des: If you are standing on the floor, the Assembly General stomps the floor with its left foot, sending out a shockwave of energy forward, indicated by a large rectangular AoE, dealing very high physical damage and knocking you back.

skills.name: 喷火器
skills.des: If you are standing on the upper right platform, the Assembly General attacks you with its large flamethrower hand, dousing the platform in flames, indicated by a large circular AoE, dealing continuous high flame damage.

skills.name: Arm Swipe
skills.des: If you are standing on the upper left platform, the Assembly General swipes its spinning blade arm across it, dealing very high physical damage.

skills.name: Head Scan
skills.des: Throughout the fight, if a party member dies, the Assembly General's head will start to glow as it performs a scan. After the scan is complete, a Tactical Facsimile is summoned into the arena to aid the boss. It copies the same class as the party member that died.

skills.name: Blade Arm Removal
skills.des: At 91%, 71%, 51%, and 31% health, the Assembly General's blade arm falls off. At the same time, Calefactors and Capacitors appear in the arena to assist the boss.

skills.name: Flamethower Arm Removal
skills.des: 88%, 68%, 48%, and 28% health, the Assembly General's flamethower arm falls off, with another wave of the same adds being summoned.

skills.name: 电化平台
skills.des: After the Assembly General reaches the center of the arena, he electrifies the majority of the arena's floor, save for some safe locations close to the Terminals' spawn points. If hit by the electrified floor, it inflicts massive shock damage.

skills.name: 轰炸
skills.des: While the Assembly General is reforming its arms, it fires rockets from its back at you, indicated by large circular AoEs, dealing high flame damage. Also, if the boss is attacked while rebuilding its arms, no damage is inflicted and in return, the boss fires an additional missile.

skills.name: Summon Terminals
skills.des: While the Assembly General is reforming its arms, four Terminals appear in four locations within the arena. At the same time, various additional traps, including poison and shock traps, appear to impede your way to them, dealing high poison and shock damage. If at least two of the terminals aren't destroyed fast enough, a burst of electricity is sent out, dealing massive shock damage.

skills.name: Final Onslaught
skills.des: At 25%, the Assembly General walks to the center of the arena one last time. However, this time no terminals are summoned, and instead the boss will focus fire missiles back to back all over the arena, increasing in quantity and rate of fire over time, dealing high flame damage each. At the same time, poison fills the edge of the central platform, indicated by rectangular AoEs, dealing very high continuous poison damage and keeping you close to itself.

skills.name: Spinning Blade Traps
skills.des: Throughout the fight, the Assembly General activates traveling spinning blade traps that patrol the ground floor of the arena, indicated by circular AoEs, dealing continuous high physical damage and snaring you.

achievement.name: 再造样式大师
achievement.des: 学习再造样式书的每一章，该样式书出现在制造大厅试炼中。

achievement.name: 精力充沛
achievement.des: 完成与击败组装将军相关的下列各项成就：

achievement.name: 制造大厅已完成
achievement.des: 击败组装将军，并协助迪瓦伊斯·弗雷阻止来自制造大厅的矮人构造体洪流的到来。

achievement.name: 制造大厅征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅击败组装将军。

achievement.name: 限时试炼：制造大厅
achievement.des: 在40分钟的时间限制内完成（老兵模式）制造大厅。当你进入泰尔弗雷下的阿班那比洞穴时试炼开始。

achievement.name: 运转丝滑
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下完成（老兵模式）制造大厅。

achievement.name: 制造大厅胜利者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中，通过重置断路器强化组装将军，然后将其击败。

achievement.name: 环境警惕性
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中，在没有任何小队成员死于陷阱和危险的情况下击败组装将军。

achievement.name: 终端终结者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中，在不让任何终端完成激活程序的情况下击败组装将军。

achievement.name: 拒绝复制体
achievement.des: 在任意难度下，对于组装将军创造的战术复制体，每种各击败5个。

achievement.name: 赛特秘闻学者
achievement.des: 发现散布在制造大厅的所有笔记。

achievement.name: 再造者杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中击败100个加热器人、电容器人或析象管人。

achievement.name: 能量之屋
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中，在不使用来自发电机的能量打破再造球体的护盾的情况下击败巅峰机械人。

achievement.name: 计划报废
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中，在不让回收机械人过充毁损机械人的情况下击败再造受托者。

achievement.name: 击杀程序
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中，在另一个混合体至少还剩余50%生命的情况下击败一个猎杀者混合体，然后再击败剩下的混合体。

achievement.name: 电击监管者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）制造大厅中，在使用少于等于六次电击塔并且无一次失手的情况下，击败大监管者。

achievement.name: 通过压力测试
achievement.des: 在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在重置断路器并强化组装将军之后完成（老兵模式）制造大厅。

achievement.name: 如钟表般精准
achievement.des: 进入阿班那比洞穴后40分钟内，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，在重置断路器并强化组装将军之后完成（老兵模式）制造大厅。

name: 卢晶堡垒
location: Northern tip of West Weald, northeast of Valente Vineyards
mystery: 虽然卢晶堡垒笼罩在重重谜团之中，但它是法格雷夫荒原的沙地上一座闪闪发光的建筑。关于其中所隐藏的东西，记载和传说众说纷纭，但它们都认同一点：那里的奥术结肯定强大到足以让另一支勇敢的探险队冒险前行。
des: Lucent Citadel is a ruined stronghold in the wastelands of Fargrave, accessible from West Weald.  Lucent Citadel is a trial, although unlike other trials, the main objective is to obtain an unstable relic called the Arcane Knot and bring it back to the entrance.

BOSS.name: 雷拉兹伯爵
BOSS.des: Count Ryelaz is a Grievous Twilight that can be encountered in Lucent Citadel, where it and Zilyesset serve as the first bosses.

BOSS.name: 卡沃特·阿格南
BOSS.des: Cavot Agnan is a Breton found in the final room of the Sunken Ruins in Lucent Citadel where he serves as the second boss.

BOSS.name: 神秘破裂碎片
BOSS.des: The Orphic Shattered Shard is a Shattered Shard encountered in the Catalyst Nook of Lucent Citadel where it serves as the third boss.

BOSS.name: 佐林
BOSS.des: Xoryn is a member of the Shardborn who is seeking to steal the Arcane Knot in the Lucent Citadel.

equipment: Perfected Slivers of the Null Arca

achievement.name: 宜结不宜解
achievement.des: 完成列出的卢晶堡垒成就。

achievement.name: 卢晶堡垒消灭者
achievement.des: 在卢晶堡垒中，击败雷拉兹伯爵、齐利塞特和神秘碎晶魔形，并获得奥术结。

achievement.name: 卢晶堡垒征服者
achievement.des: Defeat Count Ryelaz, Zilyesset, Orphic Shattered Shard, and secure the knot in Veteran Lucent Citadel.

achievement.name: 寻回专家
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，在升起挑战旗帜后，一次性击败雷拉兹伯爵和齐利塞特、神秘碎晶魔形，并获得奥术结。

achievement.name: 快速游览
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒的30分钟内，击败雷拉兹伯爵和齐利塞特、神秘碎晶魔形以及除此之外的所有敌人，并获得奥术结。计时从进入卢晶堡垒开始。

achievement.name: 结晶幸存者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败雷拉兹伯爵和齐利塞特、神秘碎晶魔形以及除此之外的所有敌人，并获得奥术结。

achievement.name: 奥术稳定者
achievement.des: 在进入（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒30分钟内，升起所有敌人的挑战旗帜，之后在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，击败雷拉兹伯爵和齐利塞特、神秘碎晶魔形以及堡垒内的所有敌人，并获得奥术结。

achievement.name: 卢晶魔人杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒击败200个魔人。

achievement.name: 光明与黑暗杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒击败200个光明使者和暗术师。

achievement.name: 毁灭反射
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，当雷拉兹伯爵和齐利塞特都在施放湮灭法术时，击败他们。

achievement.name: 光明精通
achievement.des: 在卢晶堡垒遭遇雷拉兹伯爵和齐利塞特时，击败50名被璀璨辉束和绝望辉束技能弱化的敌人。

achievement.name: 打破封印
achievement.des: 在卢晶堡垒中，在没有任何玩家被命运封印者杀死的情况下，击败神秘碎晶魔形。

achievement.name: 责任共担
achievement.des: 在卢晶堡垒中，在每位玩家都交换过一面镜子后，击败神秘碎晶魔形。

achievement.name: 绝不松手
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，确保有6名或以下的不同小队成员持有奥术结，但不允许任何队员携带奥术结两次。

achievement.name: 跨位面凝聚力
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，确保除了奥术结断裂的时候外，任何时候都总有至少5名小队成员支援奥术结携带者。

achievement.name: 拥抱黑暗
achievement.des: 在卢晶堡垒中，组队使用任意来源的辐光清除黑暗。

achievement.name: 高飞者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，在保持幽灵之光形态且不使用印记进行补充的情况下，从沉没遗迹高塔的底部一路到达顶端。

achievement.name: 撕碎碎片
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败神秘碎晶魔形。

achievement.name: 镜像合作
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）卢晶堡垒中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败雷拉兹伯爵和齐利塞特。

name: 凯恩之盾
mystery: While many Nords attribute the founding of  to  in ,  ruins tell a far older—and darker—story.
des:
Kyne's Aegis is a bastion in the Sea of Ghosts, located on an island off the coast north of Solitude.
Its original purpose was to be a bulwark against northern invasions which approached the coast via the easiest channel. Thane Ogvar was given ownership over the fort and over time, it morphed into a northern fishing village in addition to a fort. The island's gold veins have led to the Thane establishing a mining operation. Until recently, the fort has remained peaceful with only the occasional northern squall cropping up to cause concern. The transformation of the island to a fishing and mining spot has led to the slow decline of the fort.
A short time ago, tremendously large longships appeared to the north. Before a proper defense could be mustered, these ships crashed into the island, disgorging Sea Giants and Half-Giants onto the island, led by the powerful Vampire lord Falgravn. These creatures of myth quickly overwhelmed the northern island and have begun the assault of the fort proper. With the island threatened, the Thane has sent for assistance from anyone that can reach the island.
A copy of Convergence of Maestros, Volume 2 can be found near the boat that takes you to the trial.
You will receive a Defiled Oathstone with your other rewards after defeating Falgravn with hard mode engaged.

BOSS.name: 屠夫扬迪尔
BOSS.des:
Yandir the Butcher is a Sea Giant and the first boss of Kyne's Aegis. He is initially accompanied by a giant tame sea adder and a fire shaman.
After the first shaman is slain, more will continue to appear from portals, after around 40 seconds into the arena as the fight goes on. The same goes for his pets. After the initial sea adder is slain, after around a minute, either another sea adder or a gryphon will be called in. If Yandir's pets are left alive long enough, they become enraged and deal far more damage.
Once Yandir reaches 50% health, he will stop summoning pets but gains additional abilities.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 横劈
skills.des: Yandir slowly prepares and then swings his greatsword forward, dealing very high physical damage.

skills.name: 烈焰之握
skills.des: Yandir sends chains at far away targets and pulls them to him.

skills.name: 升天击
skills.des: A melee attack that deals very high physical damage and knocks targets back if it connects. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: Heal Pet
skills.des: If they're close together, Yandir will heal his pet occasionally. The tanks need to keep Yandir and his pet far away from each other. (Pre-50% only)

skills.name: 幻术图腾
skills.des: Yandir recoils into himself and then raises his harm, conjuring a Chaurus Totem, a Dragon Totem, Gargoyle Totem, or a Harpy Totem into the arena. The color of the magic in Yandir's hand indicates which totem is being summoned.

skills.name: 冰雹震爆
skills.des: Yandir looks up then leaps high into the air, similar to a warpriest, and crashes back down, dealing massive physical damage and knocking down targets. This doesn't have an AoE indicator. (Post-50% only)

skills.name: 破裂
skills.des: Yandir swings his greatsword overhead and slams it into the ground, dealing very high physical damage and knocking down targets. (Post-50% only)

BOSS.name: 威若船长
BOSS.des: Captain Vrol is a Sea Giant warrior and the second boss of Kyne's Aegis.

skills.name: 迅捷打击
skills.des: A basic melee attack dealing high physical damage.

skills.name: 雷霆猛击
skills.des: A heavy shield bash that deals very high physical damage and shock damage and stuns if it hits the target. This attack can be blocked.

skills.name: 冰冷之雾
skills.des: Captain Vrol points his hammer at a target, putting a tracking frost field around that that deals continuous high frost damage to them and nearby allies that stand in the tracking circle.

skills.name: 电击鱼叉
skills.des: Captain Vrol hurls a Sharpened Conduit into the arena floor, which then tethers and pulls multiple targets towards it, while inflicting them with continuous very high shock damage.

skills.name: 召唤
skills.des: Captain Vrol summons a Storm Twin, a copy of himself that uses the same abilities.

skills.name: Vrolsworn
skills.des: During the fight, Vrolsworn Conjurers will appear one at a time on the boat near the arena and summon portals that spawn reinforcements, in the form of Half-Giant Apothecaries, Half-Giant Bulwarks, and Half-Giant Harpooners. The most vital summons are the Bulwarks as they can make Captain Vrol invulnerable when standing near him.

BOSS.name: 法尔格拉文领主
BOSS.des:
Lord Falgravn is an ancient Vampire Lord pirate who has invaded the island of Kyne's Aegis with his Sea Giant allies. He has taken up occupation of the Dragon Cult ruins in the island's interior.
If you failed to pick up the related quest from Thane Ogvar at the trial's entrance, Lord Falgravn will drop one of two items for you to give to him so that you can collect your weekly reward. On Normal and Veteran, you will loot an Amulet of Bats, and if you complete Hard Mode, you will loot a Bloodstone Chalice.

skills.name: 尖爪
skills.des: Lord Falgravn strikes a single target with a light attack which deals high physical damage.

skills.name: 十字挥击
skills.des: Lord Falgravn strikes a single target with a heavy attack which deals very high physical damage.

skills.name: 不稳定点
skills.des: Lord Falgravn places a small shock circle on 3 (6 if hard mode is active) players which will explode after 4 seconds dealing high shock damage. Players should spread out to avoid taking more damage.

skills.name: 乔达尔中尉
skills.des: 10 seconds after the group enters combat with Lord Falgravn, Lieutenant Njordal will spawn on the north side of the room.

skills.name: Call Lightning
skills.des: At 91% and 81% health, Lord Falgravn will raise his right hand and begin channeling Grievous Pulse, which will deal slowly increasing magic damage the longer he is allowed to channel it. He will also activate 1 of the 4 conduits around the room. Group members must form a chain of bodies between the active conduit and Lord Falgravn in order to briefly stun him. This must be repeated for the 3 remaining conduits in order to stop the him from channeling. He also takes reduced damage while channeling this ability.

skills.name: 引导管路
skills.des: At 71% health, Lord Falgravn breaks the floor, forcing you and your companions to fall to the mid level. Here, you will fight a Bitter Knight, a Blood Knight, and a Crimson Knight. When all of them are dead, Lord Falgravn will descend and the next phase of the fight will begin.

skills.name: 鲜血之矛
skills.des: While battling his Knights, Lord Falgravn will target a random player every few seconds with a projectile which deals moderate magic damage.

skills.name: Hemorrhage
skills.des: Lord Falgravn will place a debuff on every player that is currently on the mid level of the barrow which will last for 30 seconds. The initial application will deal a moderate amount of magic damage which can be blocked. Players should only move when absolutely necessary (such as to avoid stacking multiple instabilities.) as they will receive a large amount of damage for a short time after doing so. During this phase, Lord Falgravn will summon several Coagulants which will begin moving towards a blood orb which has spawned in the center of the room. The group must kill as many as possible before they can reach the center.

skills.name: 大地破碎MID
skills.des: At 36% health, Lord Falgravn will break the floor once again, forcing any group members still on the mid level to fall to the lowest level of the barrow.

skills.name: 成神
skills.des: After Lord Falgravn lands on the lower level, he will recover 6% of his max health. The amount of healing done cannot be reduced by Major or Minor Defile.

skills.name: Ravenous Swarm
skills.des: After healing himself after landing, Lord Falgravn shrouds himself in a swarm of bats that will deal constant damage to the party and heal himself for the applied damage.

skills.name: 不稳定能量
skills.des: When Lord Falgravn lands at the lowest level of the barrow, the room will be surrounded by a field which deals slowly increasing magic damage to group members.

skills.name: 开门
skills.des: Lord Falgravn will fly up into the air and briefly deactivate unstable energy on the upper section. 2 of the doors will then open, each with a Torturer who will begin draining the life from a prisoner. If not dealt with by the time Unstable Energy reactivates, they will receive a large health buff and make their way down to the group, now enraged. This will be repeated up to 3 more times during the fight. Killing two torturers during this ability results in their captive helping the party attack the boss afterward.

skills.name: 怯懦
skills.des: Any player on the upper section of the lower level when Unstable Energy is active will take very heavy oblivion damage.

skills.name: Incorporeal Fiend
skills.des: While Falgravn is still on the top or mid level of the barrow, death seekers will be continuously spawning on the lower level away from the center of the room. Any player hit by their ground slam will be killed instantly.

skills.name: 流放
skills.des: On Hard Mode, if a player resurrects another fallen player, they are sent on a lower level of the arena, where they must flee one-shotting entities and reach a portal that brings them back to the boss.

achievement.name: 海巨人样式大师
achievement.des: Learn every chapter in the Sea Giant style book, occasionally found as rewards for completing the Kyne's Aegis Trial.

achievement.name: 凯恩的解救
achievement.des: 完成列出的凯恩之盾成就。

achievement.name: 凯恩之盾胜利者
achievement.des: 在凯恩之盾中击败屠夫扬迪尔、威若船长和法尔格拉文大君。

achievement.name: 凯恩之盾征服者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，击败屠夫扬迪尔、威若船长和法尔格拉文大君。

achievement.name: 凯恩之盾冲刺者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在进入凯恩栖木村庄后35分钟内，击败屠夫扬迪尔、威若船长和法尔格拉文大君，以及除此之外的所有敌人。

achievement.name: 堡垒救星
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在升起挑战旗帜后，一次性击败屠夫扬迪尔、威若船长和法尔格拉文大君。

achievement.name: 完美破城者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在进入凯恩栖木村庄后35分钟内，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下，于升起与各个头目对应的挑战旗帜之后击败屠夫扬迪尔、威若船长和法尔格拉文大君，以及他们所有的追随者。

achievement.name: 混血巨人杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中击败100个混血巨人。

achievement.name: 吸血鬼杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中击败175个吸血鬼和血疫恶魔。

achievement.name: 胆汁打破者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在没有任何玩家向另一名玩家传播查鲁斯胆汁的情况下，击败屠夫扬迪尔。

achievement.name: 单个攻城武器
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在只修复两个可用弩炮中的一个的情况下，击败威若船长。

achievement.name: 最深的感谢
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，成功解救所有被法尔格拉文大君关押的囚徒。

achievement.name: 闪电跳跃者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在不被闪电箭命中的情况下，击败屠夫扬迪尔、威若船长和法尔格拉文大君。

achievement.name: 冷酷的杀戮者
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，允许所有8名囚犯在法尔格拉文大君被击败之前死亡。

achievement.name: 饶恕仆从
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在乔达尔中尉存活的情况下击败法尔格拉文大君。

achievement.name: 随船沉没
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败威若船长。

achievement.name: 绞肉机
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在升起挑战旗帜后击败屠夫扬迪尔。

achievement.name: 完美风暴
achievement.des: 在（老兵模式）凯恩之盾中，在没有小队成员死亡的情况下击败屠夫扬迪尔、威若船长和法尔格拉文大君，以及除此之外的所有敌人。

des:
Trials are a form of endgame content in Elder Scrolls Online. They are designed for groups of 12, and each has a leaderboard associated with it. Each trial has a Normal and Veteran mode, although the leaderboard and the majority of achievements are restricted to Veteran mode.
Trials also have an additional Hard Mode for certain bosses, which can be activated manually within the dungeon itself. It typically involves activating an item or an object found near the boss. Unlike Group Dungeon hard mode (which is activated by reading a scroll), Trials hard mode can be turned on and off in all trials except for those in Craglorn.
The weekly quest for trials resets at a different time for each megaserver: on the North American server, the trial of the week quest period begins on Tuesday 6am ET (10am UTC) and ends at Monday 6pm ET (10pm UTC); on the European server, the period begins on Tuesday 3am UTC (Monday 11pm ET) and ends on Monday 3pm UTC (11am ET).
